TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FileSystem extends System.Object

summary.span: 模組包含用於執行檔案、目錄或資料夾及系統等作業的程序。

span.span: The module contains the procedures that are used to perform file, directory or folder, and system operations.

summary.span: 功能提供比使用 模組更優越的檔案 I/O 作業產能和效能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than using the module.

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個模組支援的 Visual Basic 語言關鍵字和存取檔案和資料夾的執行階段程式庫成員。This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members that access files and folders. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`GetAttr`函式來判斷檔案和目錄或資料夾的屬性。This example uses the `GetAttr` function to determine the attributes of a file and directory or folder. remarks.format: ## Remarks `ChDir`函式會變更預設目錄，但不是在預設的磁碟機。The `ChDir` function changes the default directory, but not the default drive. 例如，如果預設磁碟機 C，下列陳述式會變更磁碟機 D 上的預設目錄，但 C 則保持預設的磁碟機：For example, if the default drive is C, the following statement changes the default directory on drive D, but C remains the default drive: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#39)] 您可以進行相對目錄變更，請輸入兩個句號，如下所示：You can make relative directory changes is by typing two periods, as follows: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#40)] > [!IMPORTANT] > `ChDir`函式需要 unmanaged 程式碼的權限，這可能會影響在部分信任情況下執行。The `ChDir` function requires unmanaged code permission, which may affect its execution in partial-trust situations. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和。For more information, see and . ## Examples 這個範例會使用`ChDir`函式來變更目前的目錄或資料夾。This example uses the `ChDir` function to change the current directory or folder. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#41)]

summary.span: 傳回的字串表示符合指定模式或檔案屬性的檔案、目錄或資料夾的名稱，也可以是磁碟機的磁碟區標籤。

returns.span: 表示檔案、目錄或資料夾名稱的字串，該字串符合指定的模式或檔案屬性 (Attribute)，也可以是磁碟機的磁碟區標籤 (Label)。

span.span: A string representing the name of a file, directory, or folder that matches a specified pattern or file attribute, or the volume label of a drive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dir`函式支援使用多個字元 (`*`) 和單一字元 (`?`) 萬用字元來指定多個檔案。The `Dir` function supports the use of multiple-character (`*`) and single-character (`?`) wildcards to specify multiple files. `VbVolume` 傳回而不是特定的檔案名稱的磁碟機的磁碟區標籤。`VbVolume` returns the volume label for the drive instead of a specific file name. 您必須提供`PathName`第一次，讓您呼叫`Dir`函式。You must supply a `PathName` the first time that you call the `Dir` function. 若要擷取下一個項目，您可以進行後續呼叫`Dir`不含參數的函式。To retrieve the next item, you can make subsequent calls to the `Dir` function without parameters. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要正常運作，`Dir`函式需要並加上旗標的要授與執行的程式碼。To run correctly, the `Dir` function requires the and flags of to be granted to the executing code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < ， ，並[程式碼存取權限](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)。For more information, see , , and [Code Access Permissions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675). `Attributes`引數的列舉值如下所示：The `Attributes` argument enumeration values are as follows: |值Value|常數Constant|描述Description| |-|-|-| |`Normal`|`vbnormal`|預設值：Default. 指定沒有屬性的檔案。Specifies files without attributes.| |`ReadOnly`|`vbReadOnly`|指定唯讀檔案，以及不需屬性的檔案。Specifies read-only files, and also files without attributes.| |`Hidden`|`vbHidden`|指定隱藏的檔，以及不需屬性的檔案。Specifies hidden files, and also files without attributes.| |`System`|`vbSystem`|指定系統檔案，以及不需屬性的檔案。Specifies system files, and also files without attributes.| |`Volume`|`vbVolume`|指定磁碟區標籤。如果未指定任何其他屬性，則`vbVolume`會被忽略。Specifies volume label; if any other attribute is specified, `vbVolume` is ignored.| |`Directory`|`vbDirectory`|指定目錄或資料夾，以及不需屬性的檔案。Specifies directories or folders, and also files without attributes.| |`Archive`|`vbArchive`|前次備份之後，檔案已經有了變更。File has changed since last backup.| |`Alias`|`vbAlias`|檔案有不同的名稱。File has a different name.| > [!NOTE] > 這些列舉由 Visual Basic 語言，並可用於您的程式碼，而不是實際值的任何位置。These enumerations are specified by the Visual Basic language and can be used anywhere in your code instead of the actual values. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Dir`函式來檢查特定的檔案和目錄是否存在。This example uses the `Dir` function to check if certain files and directories exist. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dir`函式支援使用多個字元 (`*`) 和單一字元 (`?`) 萬用字元來指定多個檔案。The `Dir` function supports the use of multiple-character (`*`) and single-character (`?`) wildcards to specify multiple files. `VbVolume` 傳回而不是特定的檔案名稱的磁碟機的磁碟區標籤。`VbVolume` returns the volume label for the drive instead of a specific file name. 您必須提供`PathName`第一次，讓您呼叫`Dir`函式。You must supply a `PathName` the first time that you call the `Dir` function. 若要擷取下一個項目，您可以進行後續呼叫`Dir`不含任何參數的函式。To retrieve the next item, you can make subsequent calls to the `Dir` function with no parameters. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要正常運作，`Dir`函式需要並加上旗標的要授與執行的程式碼。To run correctly, the `Dir` function requires the and flags of to be granted to the executing code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < ， ，並[程式碼存取權限](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)。For more information, see , , and [Code Access Permissions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675). `Attributes`引數的列舉值如下所示：The `Attributes` argument enumeration values are as follows: |值Value|常數Constant|描述Description| |-|-|-| |`Normal`|`vbnormal`|預設值：Default. 指定沒有屬性的檔案。Specifies files that have no attributes.| |`ReadOnly`|`vbReadOnly`|指定唯讀檔案，除了沒有屬性的檔案。Specifies read-only files, in addition to files that have no attributes.| |`Hidden`|`vbHidden`|指定隱藏的檔，除了沒有屬性的檔案。Specifies hidden files, in addition to files that have no attributes.| |`System`|`vbSystem`|指定系統檔案，除了沒有屬性的檔案。Specifies system files, in addition to files that have no attributes.| |`Volume`|`vbVolume`|指定磁碟區標籤。如果未指定任何其他屬性，則`vbVolume`會被忽略。Specifies volume label; if any other attribute is specified, `vbVolume` is ignored.| |`Directory`|`vbDirectory`|指定目錄或資料夾，以及沒有屬性的檔案。Specifies directories or folders, in addition to files that have no attributes.| |`Archive`|`vbArchive`|前次備份之後，檔案已經有了變更。File has changed since last backup.| |`Alias`|`vbAlias`|檔案有不同的名稱。File has a different name.| > [!NOTE] > 這些列舉由 Visual Basic 語言，並可用於您的程式碼來取代實際值的任何位置。These enumerations are specified by the Visual Basic language and can be used anywhere in your code in place of the actual values. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Dir`函式來檢查特定的檔案和目錄是否存在。This example uses the `Dir` function to check if certain files and directories exist. param.name: FileNumber
param.span: 包含任何有效檔案編號的 。

span.span: An that contains any valid file number.

summary.span: 當已經到達為 或循序 開啟的檔案之結尾時，傳回布林值 (Boolean) 。

span.span: Returns a Boolean value when the end of a file opened for or sequential has been reached.

returns.span: 當已經到達為 或循序 開啟的檔案之結尾時，傳回布林值 (Boolean) 。

span.span: Returns a Boolean value when the end of a file opened for or sequential has been reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`EOF`以避免嘗試取得輸入超過檔案結尾所產生的錯誤。Use `EOF` to avoid the error generated by attempting to get input past the end of a file. `EOF`函式會傳回`False`直到達到檔案結尾為止。The `EOF` function returns `False` until the end of the file has been reached. 使用開啟的檔案`Random`或`Binary`存取`EOF`會傳回`False`直到最後一個執行`FileGet`函式是無法讀取整個記錄。With files opened for `Random` or `Binary` access, `EOF` returns `False` until the last executed `FileGet` function is unable to read a whole record. 使用開啟的檔案`Binary`存取，請嘗試透過檔案使用讀取`Input`運作直到`EOF`傳回`True`會產生錯誤。With files opened for `Binary` access, an attempt to read through the file using the `Input` function until `EOF` returns `True` generates an error. 使用`LOF`並`Loc`函數，而`EOF`讀取二進位檔案時`Input`，或使用`Get`使用時`EOF`函式。Use the `LOF` and `Loc` functions instead of `EOF` when reading binary files with `Input`, or use `Get` when using the `EOF` function. 使用開啟的檔案`Output`，`EOF`一律會傳回`True`。With files opened for `Output`, `EOF` always returns `True`. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`EOF`函式來偵測檔案的結尾。This example uses the `EOF` function to detect the end of a file. 這個範例假設`Testfile`是文字檔案，其中包含幾行文字。This example assumes that `Testfile` is a text file that contains several lines of text. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#62](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#62)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileClose`函式會提供回溯相容性，而且可能會影響效能。The `FileClose` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 對於非傳統應用程式，`My.Computer.FileSystem`物件提供更佳的效能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： StreamReader 從檔案讀取文字](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-text-from-files-with-a-streamreader.md)，[如何： 將文字寫入檔案以 streamwriter](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-text-to-files-with-a-streamwriter.md)，和[逐步解說： 中管理檔案和目錄Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/walkthrough-manipulating-files-and-directories.md)。For more information, see [How to: Read Text from Files with a StreamReader](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-text-from-files-with-a-streamreader.md), [How to: Write Text to Files with a StreamWriter](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-text-to-files-with-a-streamwriter.md), and [Walkthrough: Manipulating Files and Directories in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/walkthrough-manipulating-files-and-directories.md). 如果您省略`FileNumbers`，開啟的所有作用中檔案`FileOpen`函式會關閉。If you omit `FileNumbers`, all active files opened by the `FileOpen` function are closed. 當您關閉已開啟的檔案時`Output`或`Append`，最後的緩衝區的輸出會寫入該檔案的作業系統緩衝區。When you close files that were opened for `Output` or `Append`, the final buffer of output is written to the operating system buffer for that file. 所有的緩衝區空間的封閉型相關聯檔案釋出。All buffer space associated with the closed file is released. 當`FileClose`函式執行、 其檔案的檔案的關聯數字結尾。When the `FileClose` function is executed, the association of a file with its file number ends. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`FileClose`函式，以關閉 檔案開啟為`Input`。This example uses the `FileClose` function to close a file opened for `Input`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#69](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#69)]

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效的變數名稱，資料將讀取至其中。

summary.span: 將開放磁碟檔案的資料讀取到變數中。

span.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

summary.span: 相較於 ， 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 只有在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 讀取的資料`FileGet`通常會寫入的檔案`FilePut`。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file with `FilePut`. 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組在位置 1，第二個資料錄或位元組位於位置 2，依此類推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果您省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步 的資料錄或最後一個位元組`FileGet`或`FilePut`函式 (或最後一個指向`Seek`函式) 會讀取。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 從檔案讀取時，請勿根據檔案名稱副檔名的檔案內容的相關決策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名為 Form1.vb 檔案可能不會是 Visual Basic 來源檔案。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 隨機的模式Random Mode 在開啟的檔案的`Random`模式中，適用下列規則：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 正在讀取資料的長度是否在指定的長度小於`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FileGet`讀取後續的記錄資料錄長度界限上。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 檔案緩衝區的現有內容填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因為無法任何確定地決定填補資料的數量，通常是個不錯的主意，有符合所讀取的資料長度的資料錄長度。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 根據預設，在讀入的變數是一個字串，如果`FileGet`讀取雙位元組描述元，其中包含字串的長度，並接著會讀取變數的資料。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和更早版本支援固定長度的字串;置入檔案時，不寫入的長度描述元。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果您想要讀取描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，而您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果正在讀入的變數陣列，您可以選擇是否要讀取的大小和陣列的維度的描述元。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要寫入的描述元，將`ArrayIsDynamic`參數來`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 當讀取陣列，您一定要相符寫入陣列的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它具有描述元所撰寫，您必須讀取的描述元。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用的描述元，大小和陣列界限的傳入`FileGet`判斷要讀取的項目。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其長度等於 2，再加上 8 倍的維度數目: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於要寫入的陣列資料和陣列描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 比方說，下列陣列宣告需要 218 的位元組陣列寫入至磁碟。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218 個位元組的分散，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述元的 18 個位元組: (2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 個位元組的資料: (5 \* 10 \* 4)。200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果被讀入到變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FileGet`讀取變數的資料。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於所讀取的資料長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 如同讀取每個個別，只不過是沒有任何項目之間的填補，讀取結構的項目。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁碟上，動態陣列中的使用者定義型別 (以`FilePut`) 加上其長度會等於 2 加上 8 倍的維度數目的描述元: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於讀取個別的項目所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 這包括任何陣列和其描述項。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中指出的大小字串寫入時的結構至磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式規則的套用，但有些例外狀況。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式與不同的規則`Random`模式︰The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 從磁碟讀取所有的變數時，也將連續;也就不含之間的填補的記錄。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FileGet`讀取的資料。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 不讀取任何描述項。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 讀取可變長度的字串不是結構，而不需要雙位元組長度的描述項的項目。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 讀取的位元組數目等於已經在字串中的字元數。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用 從檔案讀取`FileGet`函式需要`Read`從存取列舉型別。Reading from a file by using the`FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

正在讀取資料的長度是否在指定的長度小於`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FileGet`讀取後續的記錄資料錄長度界限上。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 檔案緩衝區的現有內容填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因為無法任何確定地決定填補資料的數量，通常是個不錯的主意，有符合所讀取的資料長度的資料錄長度。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 根據預設，在讀入的變數是一個字串，如果`FileGet`讀取雙位元組描述元，其中包含字串的長度，並接著會讀取變數的資料。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和更早版本支援固定長度的字串;置入檔案時，不寫入的長度描述元。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果您想要讀取描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，而您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果正在讀入的變數陣列，您可以選擇是否要讀取的大小和陣列的維度的描述元。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要寫入的描述元，將`ArrayIsDynamic`參數來`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 當讀取陣列，您一定要相符寫入陣列的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它具有描述元所撰寫，您必須讀取的描述元。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果不使用描述項。If the descriptor is not used. 則的大小和陣列的界限傳遞到`FileGet`判斷要讀取的項目。Then the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其長度等於 2，再加上 8 倍的維度數目: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於要寫入的陣列資料和陣列描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 比方說，下列陣列宣告需要 218 的位元組陣列寫入至磁碟。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218 個位元組的分散，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述元的 18 個位元組: (2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 個位元組的資料: (5 \* 10 \* 4)。200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果被讀入到變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FileGet`讀取變數的資料。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於所讀取的資料長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 如同讀取每個個別，只不過是沒有任何項目之間的填補，讀取結構的項目。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁碟上，動態陣列中的使用者定義型別 (以`FilePut`) 加上其長度會等於 2 加上 8 倍的維度數目的描述元: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於讀取個別的項目所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 這包括任何陣列和其描述項。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中指出的大小字串寫入時的結構至磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式規則的套用，但有些例外狀況。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式與不同的規則`Random`模式︰The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 從磁碟讀取所有的變數時，也將連續;也就不含之間的填補的記錄。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FileGet`讀取的資料。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 不讀取任何描述項。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 讀取可變長度的字串不是結構，而不需要雙位元組長度的描述項的項目。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 讀取的位元組數目等於已經在字串中的字元數。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用 從檔案讀取`FileGet`函式需要`Read`從存取列舉型別。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FileGet (int FileNumber, ref char Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, char& Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FileGet (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Char, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FileGet : int * * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效的變數名稱，資料將讀取至其中。

span.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 要開始讀取的資料錄數目 ( 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 ( 模式檔案)。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

summary.span: 將開放磁碟檔案的資料讀取到變數中。

span.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

summary.span: 相較於 ， 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 只有在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 讀取的資料`FileGet`通常會寫入的檔案`FilePut`。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file with `FilePut`. 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組在位置 1，第二個資料錄或位元組位於位置 2，依此類推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果您省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步 的資料錄或最後一個位元組`FileGet`或`FilePut`函式 (或最後一個指向`Seek`函式) 會讀取。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 從檔案讀取時，請勿根據檔案名稱副檔名的檔案內容的相關決策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名為 Form1.vb 檔案可能不會是 Visual Basic 來源檔案。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 隨機的模式Random Mode 在開啟的檔案的`Random`模式中，適用下列規則：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 正在讀取資料的長度是否在指定的長度小於`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FileGet`讀取後續的記錄資料錄長度界限上。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 檔案緩衝區的現有內容填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因為無法任何確定地決定填補資料的數量，通常是個不錯的主意，有符合所讀取的資料長度的資料錄長度。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 根據預設，在讀入的變數是一個字串，如果`FileGet`讀取雙位元組描述元，其中包含字串的長度，並接著會讀取變數的資料。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和更早版本支援固定長度的字串;置入檔案時，不寫入的長度描述元。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果您想要讀取描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，而您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果正在讀入的變數陣列，您可以選擇是否要讀取的大小和陣列的維度的描述元。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要寫入的描述元，將`ArrayIsDynamic`參數來`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 當讀取陣列，您一定要相符寫入陣列的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它具有描述元所撰寫，您必須讀取的描述元。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用的描述元，大小和陣列界限的傳入`FileGet`判斷要讀取的項目。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其長度等於 2，再加上 8 倍的維度數目: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於要寫入的陣列資料和陣列描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 比方說，下列陣列宣告需要 218 的位元組陣列寫入至磁碟。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218 個位元組的分散，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述元的 18 個位元組: (2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 個位元組的資料: (5 \* 10 \* 4)。200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果被讀入到變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FileGet`讀取變數的資料。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於所讀取的資料長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 如同讀取每個個別，只不過是沒有任何項目之間的填補，讀取結構的項目。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁碟上，動態陣列中的使用者定義型別 (以`FilePut`) 加上其長度會等於 2 加上 8 倍的維度數目的描述元: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於讀取個別的項目所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 這包括任何陣列和其描述項。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中指出的大小字串寫入時的結構至磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式規則的套用，但有些例外狀況。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式與不同的規則`Random`模式︰The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 從磁碟讀取所有的變數時，也將連續;也就不含之間的填補的記錄。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 根據預設，在讀入的變數是一個字串，如果`FileGet`讀取雙位元組描述元，其中包含字串的長度，並接著會讀取變數的資料。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和更早版本支援固定長度的字串;置入檔案時，不寫入的長度描述元。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果您想要讀取描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，而您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果正在讀入的變數陣列，您可以選擇是否要讀取的大小和陣列的維度的描述元。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要寫入的描述元，將`ArrayIsDynamic`參數來`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 當讀取陣列，您一定要相符寫入陣列的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它具有描述元所撰寫，您必須讀取的描述元。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用的描述元，大小和陣列界限的傳入`FileGet`判斷要讀取的項目。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其長度等於 2，再加上 8 倍的維度數目: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於要寫入的陣列資料和陣列描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 比方說，下列陣列宣告需要 218 的位元組陣列寫入至磁碟。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218 個位元組的分散，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述元的 18 個位元組: (2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 個位元組的資料: (5 \* 10 \* 4)。200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果被讀入到變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FileGet`讀取變數的資料。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於所讀取的資料長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 如同讀取每個個別，只不過是沒有任何項目之間的填補，讀取結構的項目。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁碟上，動態陣列中的使用者定義型別 (以`FilePut`) 加上其長度會等於 2 加上 8 倍的維度數目的描述元: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於讀取個別的項目所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 這包括任何陣列和其描述項。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中指出的大小字串寫入時的結構至磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式規則的套用，但有些例外狀況。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式與不同的規則`Random`模式︰The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 從磁碟讀取所有的變數時，也將連續;也就不含之間的填補的記錄。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FileGet`讀取的資料。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 不讀取任何描述項。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 讀取可變長度的字串不是結構，而不需要雙位元組長度的描述項的項目。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 讀取的位元組數目等於已經在字串中的字元數。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用 從檔案讀取`FileGet`函式需要`Read`從存取列舉型別。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FileGet (int FileNumber, ref decimal Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, valuetype System.Decimal& Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FileGet (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Decimal, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FileGet : int * * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效的變數名稱，資料將讀取至其中。

span.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 要開始讀取的資料錄數目 ( 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 ( 模式檔案)。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

summary.span: 將開放磁碟檔案的資料讀取到變數中。

span.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

summary.span: 相較於 ， 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 只有在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 讀取的資料`FileGet`通常會先寫入至檔案使用`FilePut`。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file by using `FilePut`. 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組在位置 1，第二個資料錄或位元組位於位置 2，依此類推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果您省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步 的資料錄或最後一個位元組`FileGet`或`FilePut`函式 (或最後一個指向`Seek`函式) 會讀取。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 從檔案讀取時，請勿根據檔案名稱副檔名的檔案內容的相關決策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名為 Form1.vb 檔案可能不會是 Visual Basic 來源檔案。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 隨機的模式Random Mode 在開啟的檔案的`Random`模式中，適用下列規則：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 正在讀取資料的長度是否在指定的長度小於`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FileGet`讀取後續的記錄資料錄長度界限上。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 檔案緩衝區的現有內容填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因為無法任何確定地決定填補資料的數量，通常是個不錯的主意，有符合所讀取的資料長度的資料錄長度。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 根據預設，在讀入的變數是一個字串，如果`FileGet`讀取雙位元組描述元，其中包含字串的長度，並接著會讀取變數的資料。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和更早版本支援固定長度的字串;置入檔案時，不寫入的長度描述元。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果您想要讀取描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，而您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果正在讀入的變數陣列，您可以選擇是否要讀取的大小和陣列的維度的描述元。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要寫入的描述元，將`ArrayIsDynamic`參數來`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 當讀取陣列，您一定要相符寫入陣列的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它具有描述元所撰寫，您必須讀取的描述元。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用的描述元，大小和陣列界限的傳入`FileGet`判斷要讀取的項目。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其長度等於 2，再加上 8 倍的維度數目: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於要寫入的陣列資料和陣列描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 比方說，下列陣列宣告需要 218 的位元組陣列寫入至磁碟。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218 個位元組的分散，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述元的 18 個位元組: (2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 個位元組的資料: (5 \* 10 \* 4)。200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果被讀入到變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FileGet`讀取變數的資料。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於所讀取的資料長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 如同讀取每個個別，只不過是沒有任何項目之間的填補，讀取結構的項目。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁碟上，動態陣列中的使用者定義型別 (以`FilePut`) 加上其長度會等於 2 加上 8 倍的維度數目的描述元: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於讀取個別的項目所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 這包括任何陣列和其描述項。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中指出的大小字串寫入時的結構至磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式規則的套用，但有些例外狀況。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式與不同的規則`Random`模式︰The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 從磁碟讀取所有的變數時，也將連續;也就不含之間的填補的記錄。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FileGet`讀取的資料。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 不讀取任何描述項。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 讀取可變長度的字串不是結構，而不需要雙位元組長度的描述項的項目。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 讀取的位元組數目等於已經在字串中的字元數。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用 從檔案讀取`FileGet`函式需要`Read`從存取列舉型別。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

200 個位元組的資料: (5 \* 10 \* 4)。200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果被讀入到變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FileGet`讀取變數的資料。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於所讀取的資料長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 如同讀取每個個別，只不過是沒有任何項目之間的填補，讀取結構的項目。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁碟上，動態陣列中的使用者定義型別 (以`FilePut`) 加上其長度會等於 2 加上 8 倍的維度數目的描述元: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於讀取個別的項目所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 這包括任何陣列和其描述項。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中指出的大小字串寫入時的結構至磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式規則的套用，但有些例外狀況。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式與不同的規則`Random`模式︰The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 從磁碟讀取所有的變數時，也將連續;也就不含之間的填補的記錄。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FileGet`讀取的資料。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 不讀取任何描述項。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 讀取可變長度的字串不是結構，而不需要雙位元組長度的描述項的項目。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 讀取的位元組數目等於已經在字串中的字元數。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用 從檔案讀取`FileGet`函式需要`Read`從存取列舉型別。Reading from a file by using the`FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FileGet (int FileNumber, ref short Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, int16& Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FileGet (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Short, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FileGet : int * * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效的變數名稱，資料將讀取至其中。

span.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 要開始讀取的資料錄數目 ( 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 ( 模式檔案)。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

summary.span: 將開放磁碟檔案的資料讀取到變數中。

span.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

summary.span: 相較於 ， 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 只有在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 讀取的資料`FileGet`通常會先寫入至檔案使用`FilePut`。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file by using `FilePut`. 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組在位置 1，第二個資料錄或位元組位於位置 2，依此類推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果您省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步 的資料錄或最後一個位元組`FileGet`或`FilePut`函式 (或最後一個指向`Seek`函式) 會讀取。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 從檔案讀取時，請勿根據檔案名稱副檔名的檔案內容的相關決策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名為 Form1.vb 檔案可能不會是 Visual Basic 來源檔案。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 隨機的模式Random Mode 在開啟的檔案的`Random`模式中，適用下列規則：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 正在讀取資料的長度是否在指定的長度小於`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FileGet`讀取後續的記錄資料錄長度界限上。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 檔案緩衝區的現有內容填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因為無法任何確定地決定填補資料的數量，通常是個不錯的主意，有符合所讀取的資料長度的資料錄長度。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 根據預設，在讀入的變數是一個字串，如果`FileGet`讀取雙位元組描述元，其中包含字串的長度，並接著會讀取變數的資料。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和更早版本支援固定長度的字串;置入檔案時，不寫入的長度描述元。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果您想要讀取描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，而您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果正在讀入的變數陣列，您可以選擇是否要讀取的大小和陣列的維度的描述元。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要寫入的描述元，將`ArrayIsDynamic`參數來`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 當讀取陣列，您一定要相符寫入陣列的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它具有描述元所撰寫，您必須讀取的描述元。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用的描述元，大小和陣列界限的傳入`FileGet`判斷要讀取的項目。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其長度等於 2，再加上 8 倍的維度數目: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於要寫入的陣列資料和陣列描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 比方說，下列陣列宣告需要 218 的位元組陣列寫入至磁碟。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218 個位元組的分散，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述元的 18 個位元組: (2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 個位元組的資料: (5 \* 10 \* 4)。200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果被讀入到變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FileGet`讀取變數的資料。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於所讀取的資料長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 如同讀取每個個別，只不過是沒有任何項目之間的填補，讀取結構的項目。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁碟上，動態陣列中的使用者定義型別 (以`FilePut`) 加上其長度會等於 2 加上 8 倍的維度數目的描述元: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於讀取個別的項目所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 這包括任何陣列和其描述項。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中指出的大小字串寫入時的結構至磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式規則的套用，但有些例外狀況。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式與不同的規則`Random`模式︰The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 從磁碟讀取所有的變數時，也將連續;也就不含之間的填補的記錄。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FileGet`讀取的資料。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 不讀取任何描述項。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 讀取可變長度的字串不是結構，而不需要雙位元組長度的描述項的項目。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 讀取的位元組數目等於已經在字串中的字元數。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用 從檔案讀取`FileGet`函式需要`Read`從存取列舉型別。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FileGet (int FileNumber, ref long Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, int64& Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FileGet (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Long, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FileGet : int * * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效的變數名稱，資料將讀取至其中。

span.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 要開始讀取的資料錄數目 ( 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 ( 模式檔案)。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

summary.span: 將開放磁碟檔案的資料讀取到變數中。

span.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

summary.span: 相較於 ， 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 只有在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 讀取的資料`FileGet`通常會先寫入至檔案使用`FilePut`。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file by using `FilePut`. 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組在位置 1，第二個資料錄或位元組位於位置 2，依此類推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果您省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步 的資料錄或最後一個位元組`FileGet`或`FilePut`函式 (或最後一個指向`Seek`函式) 會讀取。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 從檔案讀取時，請勿根據檔案名稱副檔名的檔案內容的相關決策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名為 Form1.vb 檔案可能不會是 Visual Basic 來源檔案。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 隨機的模式Random Mode 在開啟的檔案的`Random`模式中，適用下列規則：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 正在讀取資料的長度是否在指定的長度小於`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FileGet`讀取後續的記錄資料錄長度界限上。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 檔案緩衝區的現有內容填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因為無法任何確定地決定填補資料的數量，通常是個不錯的主意，有符合所讀取的資料長度的資料錄長度。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 根據預設，在讀入的變數是一個字串，如果`FileGet`讀取雙位元組描述元，其中包含字串的長度，並接著會讀取變數的資料。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和更早版本支援固定長度的字串;置入檔案時，不寫入的長度描述元。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果您想要讀取描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，而您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果正在讀入的變數陣列，您可以選擇是否要讀取的大小和陣列的維度的描述元。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要寫入的描述元，將`ArrayIsDynamic`參數來`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 當讀取陣列，您一定要相符寫入陣列的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它具有描述元所撰寫，您必須讀取的描述元。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用的描述元，大小和陣列界限的傳入`FileGet`判斷要讀取的項目。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其長度等於 2，再加上 8 倍的維度數目: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於要寫入的陣列資料和陣列描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 比方說，下列陣列宣告需要 218 的位元組陣列寫入至磁碟。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218 個位元組的分散，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述元的 18 個位元組: (2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 個位元組的資料: (5 \* 10 \* 4)。200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果被讀入到變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FileGet`讀取變數的資料。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於所讀取的資料長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 如同讀取每個個別，只不過是沒有任何項目之間的填補，讀取結構的項目。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁碟上，動態陣列中的使用者定義型別 (以`FilePut`) 加上其長度會等於 2 加上 8 倍的維度數目的描述元: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於讀取個別的項目所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 這包括任何陣列和其描述項。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中指出的大小字串寫入時的結構至磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式規則的套用，但有些例外狀況。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式與不同的規則`Random`模式︰The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 從磁碟讀取所有的變數時，也將連續;也就不含之間的填補的記錄。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FileGet`讀取的資料。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 不讀取任何描述項。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 讀取可變長度的字串不是結構，而不需要雙位元組長度的描述項的項目。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 讀取的位元組數目等於已經在字串中的字元數。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用 從檔案讀取`FileGet`函式需要`Read`從存取列舉型別。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 只有在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 讀取的資料`FileGet`通常會先寫入至檔案使用`FilePut`。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file by using `FilePut`. 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組在位置 1，第二個資料錄或位元組位於位置 2，依此類推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果您省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步 的資料錄或最後一個位元組`FileGet`或`FilePut`函式 (或最後一個指向`Seek`函式) 會讀取。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 從檔案讀取時，請勿根據檔案名稱副檔名的檔案內容的相關決策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名為 Form1.vb 檔案可能不會是 Visual Basic 來源檔案。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 隨機的模式Random Mode 在開啟的檔案的`Random`模式中，適用下列規則：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 正在讀取資料的長度是否在指定的長度小於`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FileGet`讀取後續的記錄資料錄長度界限上。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 檔案緩衝區的現有內容填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因為無法任何確定地決定填補資料的數量，通常是個不錯的主意，有符合所讀取的資料長度的資料錄長度。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 根據預設，在讀入的變數是一個字串，如果`FileGet`讀取雙位元組描述元，其中包含字串的長度，並接著會讀取變數的資料。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和更早版本支援固定長度的字串;置入檔案時，不寫入的長度描述元。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果您想要讀取描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，而您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果正在讀入的變數陣列，您可以選擇是否要讀取的大小和陣列的維度的描述元。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要寫入的描述元，將`ArrayIsDynamic`參數來`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 當讀取陣列，您一定要相符寫入陣列的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它具有描述元所撰寫，您必須讀取的描述元。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用的描述元，大小和陣列界限的傳入`FileGet`判斷要讀取的項目。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其長度等於 2，再加上 8 倍的維度數目: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於要寫入的陣列資料和陣列描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 比方說，下列陣列宣告需要 218 的位元組陣列寫入至磁碟。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218 個位元組的分散，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述元的 18 個位元組: (2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 個位元組的資料: (5 \* 10 \* 4)。200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果被讀入到變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FileGet`讀取變數的資料。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於所讀取的資料長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 如同讀取每個個別，只不過是沒有任何項目之間的填補，讀取結構的項目。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁碟上，動態陣列中的使用者定義型別 (以`FilePut`) 加上其長度會等於 2 加上 8 倍的維度數目的描述元: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於讀取個別的項目所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 這包括任何陣列和其描述項。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中指出的大小字串寫入時的結構至磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式規則的套用，但有些例外狀況。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式與不同的規則`Random`模式︰The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 從磁碟讀取所有的變數時，也將連續;也就不含之間的填補的記錄。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FileGet`讀取的資料。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 不讀取任何描述項。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 讀取可變長度的字串不是結構，而不需要雙位元組長度的描述項的項目。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 讀取的位元組數目等於已經在字串中的字元數。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用 從檔案讀取`FileGet`函式需要`Read`從存取列舉型別。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

related.span: 在 Visual Basic 中讀取檔案

span.span: Reading from Files in Visual Basic

related.span: 在 Visual Basic 中寫入檔案

span.span: Writing to Files in Visual Basic

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FileGet (int FileNumber, ref string Value, long RecordNumber = -1, bool StringIsFixedLength = false);
.method public static void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, string& Value, int64 RecordNumber, bool StringIsFixedLength) cil managed
Public Sub FileGet (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As String, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1, Optional StringIsFixedLength As Boolean = false)
static member FileGet : int * * int64 * bool -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效的變數名稱，資料將讀取至其中。

span.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 要開始讀取的資料錄數目 ( 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 ( 模式檔案)。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

param.name: StringIsFixedLength
param.span: 只有在編寫字串時才適用。

span.span: Applies only when writing a string.

param.span: 指定是否要為字串寫入描述長度的雙位元組描述元。

span.span: Specifies whether to write a two-byte descriptor for the string that describes the length.

summary.span: 將開放磁碟檔案的資料讀取到變數中。

span.span: Reads data from an open disk file into a variable.

summary.span: 相較於 ， 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FileGet (int FileNumber, ref Array Value, long RecordNumber = -1, bool ArrayIsDynamic = false, bool StringIsFixedLength = false);
.method public static void FileGet(int32 FileNumber, class System.Array& Value, int64 RecordNumber, bool ArrayIsDynamic, bool StringIsFixedLength) cil managed
Public Sub FileGet (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Array, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1, Optional ArrayIsDynamic As Boolean = false, Optional StringIsFixedLength As Boolean = false)
static member FileGet : int * * int64 * bool * bool -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效的變數名稱，資料將讀取至其中。

span.span: Valid variable name into which data is read.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 要開始讀取的資料錄數目 ( 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 ( 模式檔案)。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which reading starts.

param.name: ArrayIsDynamic
param.span: 只有在編寫陣列時才適用。

span.span: Applies only when writing an array.

param.span: 指定是否將陣列視為動態 (Dynamic)，以及是否有必要指定描述陣列大小和界限的陣列描述元。

span.span: Specifies whether the array is to be treated as dynamic and whether an array descriptor describing the size and bounds of the array is necessary.

param.name: StringIsFixedLength
param.span: 只有在編寫字串時才適用。

span.span: Applies only when writing a string.

param.span: 指定是否要為字串寫入描述長度的雙位元組描述元。

span.span: Specifies whether to write a two-byte descriptor for the string that describes the length.

summary.span: 將開放磁碟檔案的資料讀取到變數中。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGet` 只有在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGet` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 讀取的資料`FileGet`通常會先寫入至檔案使用`FilePut`。Data read with `FileGet` is usually written to a file by using `FilePut`. 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組在位置 1，第二個資料錄或位元組位於位置 2，依此類推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果您省略`RecordNumber`下, 一步 的資料錄或最後一個位元組`FileGet`或`FilePut`函式 (或最後一個指向`Seek`函式) 會讀取。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte following the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function) is read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 從檔案讀取時，請勿根據檔案名稱副檔名的檔案內容的相關決策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名為 Form1.vb 檔案可能不會是 Visual Basic 來源檔案。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## 隨機的模式Random Mode 在開啟的檔案的`Random`模式中，適用下列規則：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 正在讀取資料的長度是否在指定的長度小於`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FileGet`讀取後續的記錄資料錄長度界限上。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGet` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 檔案緩衝區的現有內容填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。The space between the end of one record and the starting of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因為無法任何確定地決定填補資料的數量，通常是個不錯的主意，有符合所讀取的資料長度的資料錄長度。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 根據預設，在讀入的變數是一個字串，如果`FileGet`讀取雙位元組描述元，其中包含字串的長度，並接著會讀取變數的資料。By default, if the variable being read into is a string, `FileGet` reads a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和更早版本支援固定長度的字串;置入檔案時，不寫入的長度描述元。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings; when put to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果您想要讀取描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，而您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果正在讀入的變數陣列，您可以選擇是否要讀取的大小和陣列的維度的描述元。If the variable being read into is an array, you can choose whether to read a descriptor for the size and dimension of the array. 若要寫入的描述元，將`ArrayIsDynamic`參數來`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 當讀取陣列，您一定要相符寫入陣列的方式。When reading the array, you have to match the way the array was written. 如果它具有描述元所撰寫，您必須讀取的描述元。If it was written with the descriptor, you have to read the descriptor. 如果未使用的描述元，大小和陣列界限的傳入`FileGet`判斷要讀取的項目。If the descriptor is not used, the size and bounds of the array passed into `FileGet` determine what to read. 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其長度等於 2，再加上 8 倍的維度數目: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於要寫入的陣列資料和陣列描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 比方說，下列陣列宣告需要 218 的位元組陣列寫入至磁碟。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#21)] 218 個位元組的分散，如下所示：The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: - 描述元的 18 個位元組: (2 + 8 \* 2)18 bytes for the descriptor: (2 + 8 \* 2) - 200 個位元組的資料: (5 \* 10 \* 4)。200 bytes for the data: (5 \* 10 \* 4). - 如果被讀入到變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FileGet`讀取變數的資料。If the variable being read into is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FileGet` reads only the variable data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於所讀取的資料長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being read. - `FileGet` 如同讀取每個個別，只不過是沒有任何項目之間的填補，讀取結構的項目。`FileGet` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁碟上，動態陣列中的使用者定義型別 (以`FilePut`) 加上其長度會等於 2 加上 8 倍的維度數目的描述元: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePut`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於讀取個別的項目所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements. 這包括任何陣列和其描述項。This includes any arrays and their descriptors. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中指出的大小字串寫入時的結構至磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of a string when written to disk. ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式規則的套用，但有些例外狀況。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式與不同的規則`Random`模式︰The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGet` 從磁碟讀取所有的變數時，也將連續;也就不含之間的填補的記錄。`FileGet` reads all variables from disk contiguously; that is, without padding between records. - 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FileGet`讀取的資料。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGet` reads only the data. 不讀取任何描述項。No descriptor is read. - `FileGet` 讀取可變長度的字串不是結構，而不需要雙位元組長度的描述項的項目。`FileGet` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 讀取的位元組數目等於已經在字串中的字元數。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用 從檔案讀取`FileGet`函式需要`Read`從存取列舉型別。Reading from a file by using the `FileGet` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration.

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效的變數名稱，資料將讀取至其中。
