remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileGetObject`而不是使用函式`FileGet`若要避免模稜兩可在編譯時期，如果型別`Object`傳回而不是另一個類型，例如`Integer`， `Long`， `Short`，依此類推。The `FileGetObject` function is used instead of `FileGet` to avoid ambiguities at compile time if type `Object` is returned instead of another type, such as `Integer`, `Long`, `Short`, and so forth. 如果您想要寫出`Variant`型別，`FileGetObject`需要。If you intend to write out the `Variant` type, `FileGetObject` is required. 有疑問，如果您使用物件來作為第二個參數，一律建議您改用`FilePutObject`和`FileGetObject`。When in doubt, if you are using an object for the second parameter, it is always suggested that you use `FilePutObject` and `FileGetObject`. `FileGetObject` 只有在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FileGetObject` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 讀取的資料`FileGetObject`通常會使用寫入`FilePutObject`。Data read with `FileGetObject` is usually written with `FilePutObject`. 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組在位置 1，第二個資料錄或位元組位於位置 2，依此類推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果您省略`RecordNumber`，`FileGetObject`讀取最後一個之後的資料錄或位元組`FileGetObject`或是`FilePutObject`函式 (或最後一個指向`Seek`函式)。If you omit `RecordNumber`, `FileGetObject` reads the record or byte after the last `FileGetObject` or `FilePutObject` function (or pointed to by the last `Seek` function). ## 隨機的模式Random Mode 在開啟的檔案的`Random`模式中，適用下列規則：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 正在讀取資料的長度是否在指定的長度小於`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FileGetObject`讀取後續的記錄資料錄長度界限上。If the length of the data being read is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FileGetObject` reads subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 檔案緩衝區的現有內容填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開頭之間的空間。The space between the end of one record and the beginning of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因為填補資料的數量無法精確地判斷，所以最好有符合所讀取的資料長度的資料錄長度。Because the amount of padding data cannot be precisely determined, it is a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being read. - 正在讀取到變數是否為字串，預設`FileGetObject`讀取雙位元組描述元包含字串的長度，然後再讀取變數的資料。If the variable being read into is a string, by default `FileGetObject` reads a two-byte descriptor containing the string length and then reads the data that goes into the variable. 因此，所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. Visual Basic 6.0 和更早版本支援固定長度字串和讀取檔案時，長度的描述項不會寫入。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions support fixed-length strings and when read to a file, the length descriptor is not written. 如果您想要讀取描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，而您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。If you want to read a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果正在讀入的變數陣列，則所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於要寫入的陣列資料和陣列描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。If the variable being read into is an array, then the record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其長度等於 2，再加上 8 倍的維度數目： 2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: 2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions. 比方說，下列陣列宣告需要 218 的位元組陣列寫入至磁碟：For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#27)] 218 個位元組會分散，如下所示： 18 位元組描述元 (2 + 8 \* 2)，以及 100 個位元組 (5 \* 10 \* 4) 的資料。The 218 bytes are distributed as follows: 18 bytes for the descriptor (2 + 8 \* 2), and 100 bytes for the data (5 \* 10 \* 4). - `FileGetObject` 如同讀取每個個別，只不過是沒有任何項目之間的填補，讀取結構的項目。`FileGetObject` reads elements of structures as if each were being read individually, except that there is no padding between elements. 在磁碟上，動態陣列中的使用者定義型別 (以`FilePutObject`) 加上其長度會等於 2 加上 8 倍的維度數目的描述元： 2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions。On disk, a dynamic array in a user-defined type (written with `FilePutObject`) is prefixed by a descriptor whose length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: 2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於讀取個別的項目，包括任何陣列和其描述項所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to read the individual elements, including any arrays and their descriptors. 類別，可指出的大小字串寫入時的結構中的字串欄位套用至磁碟。The class can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of string when written to disk. ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，所有`Random`套用規則，但有下列例外：For files opened in `Binary` mode, all of the `Random` rules apply, with these exceptions: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FileGetObject` 所有連續讀取變數，從磁碟，也就是記錄之間的不帶填補。`FileGetObject` reads all variables from disk contiguously, that is, with no padding between records. - 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FileGetObject`讀取的資料。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FileGetObject` reads only the data. 不讀取任何描述項。No descriptor is read. `FileGetObject` 讀取可變長度的字串不是結構，而不需要雙位元組長度的描述項的項目。`FileGetObject` reads variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without expecting the two-byte length descriptor. 讀取的位元組數目等於已經在字串中的字元數。The number of bytes read equals the number of characters already in the string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 從檔案讀取時，請勿根據檔案名稱副檔名的檔案內容的相關決策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名為 Form1.vb 檔案可能不是 Visual Basic 來源檔案。For example, a file named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## Examples 下列範例讀入測試檔案中的記錄，然後擷取它。The following example reads a record into a test file and then retrieves it. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#26)]

PathName 可包含目錄或資料夾及磁碟機。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的檔案時，開啟`FileLen`函式呼叫，傳回的值代表檔案的大小，在它已開啟的時間。If the specified file is open when the `FileLen` function is called, the value returned represents the size of the file at the time it was opened. > [!NOTE] > 若要取得目前已開啟之檔案的長度，請使用`LOF`函式。To obtain the current length of an open file, use the `LOF` function. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`FileLen`函數來傳回檔案的長度，以位元組為單位。This example uses the `FileLen` function to return the length of a file in bytes. 基於此範例的詳細資訊，假設`TestFile`是包含某些資料的檔案。For purposes of this example, assume that `TestFile` is a file that contains some data. remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileOpen`函式會提供回溯相容性，而且可能會影響效能。The `FileOpen` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 對於非傳統應用程式，`My.Computer.FileSystem`物件提供更佳的效能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 Visual Basic 存取檔案](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 您必須開啟檔案，才能在其上執行任何 I/O 作業。You must open a file before any I/O operation can be performed on it. `FileOpen` 會針對 I/O 配置緩衝區至檔案，並判斷權限與緩衝區使用的模式。`FileOpen` allocates a buffer for I/O to the file and determines the mode of access to use with the buffer. > [!IMPORTANT] > 寫入至檔案時，應用程式可能要建立檔案，如果嘗試寫入的檔案不存在。When writing to a file, an application may have to create a file, if the file to which it is trying to write does not exist. 若要這樣做，它會需要權限的 建立檔案的目錄。To do so, it needs permission for the directory in which the file is to be created. 不過，如果指定的檔案`FileName`存在，應用程式需求`Write`只對檔案本身的權限。However, if the file specified by `FileName` does exist, the application needs `Write` permission only to the file itself. 盡量，以協助改善安全性、 部署和授與期間建立檔案的任一處`Write`該檔案的權限唯一的而不是整個目錄。Wherever possible, to help improve security, create the file during deployment and grant `Write` permission to that file only, instead of to the whole directory. 若要改善安全性，請將資料寫入使用者目錄，而不是目錄的根目錄或 Program Files 目錄。To help improve security, write data to user directories instead of to the root directory or the Program Files directory. 若要開啟的通道可使用`FreeFile()`函式。The channel to open can be found by using the `FreeFile()` function. > [!IMPORTANT] > `FileOpen`函式需要`Read`從存取`FileIOPermissionAccess`列舉型別，這可能會影響在部分信任情況下執行。The `FileOpen` function requires `Read` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration, which may affect its execution in partial trust situations. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱列舉型別。For more information, see enumeration. ## Examples 此範例說明的各種用法`FileOpen`函式可讓輸入與輸出至檔案。This example illustrates various uses of the `FileOpen` function to enable input and output to a file. 下列程式碼會開啟檔案`TestFile`在`Input`模式。The following code opens the file `TestFile` in `Input` mode. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 此範例會開啟中的檔案`Binary`模式只允許寫入作業。This example opens the file in `Binary` mode for writing operations only. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 下列範例會開啟中的檔案`Random`模式。The following example opens the file in `Random` mode. 檔案包含的結構記錄`Person`。The file contains records of the structure `Person`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#7)] 此程式碼範例會開啟中的檔案`Output`模式; 任何程序可以讀取或寫入檔案。This code example opens the file in `Output` mode; any process can read or write to file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#8)] 此程式碼範例會開啟中的檔案`Binary`模式進行讀取，其他處理序無法讀取檔案。This code example opens the file in `Binary` mode for reading; other processes cannot read file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, bool Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, bool Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As Boolean, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FilePut : int * bool * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效的變數名稱，該名稱包含已寫入磁碟的資料。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 寫入開始的資料錄數目 ( 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 ( 模式檔案)。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: 將變數資料寫入磁碟檔案。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相較於 ， 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 只有在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 使用 `FilePut` 寫入的資料，通常會透過使用 `FileGet` 從檔案讀取。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組在位置 1，第二個資料錄或位元組位於位置 2，依此類推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果您省略`RecordNumber`下, 一個資料錄或最後一個之後的位元組`FileGet`或是`FilePut`函式，或指向最後一個`Seek`撰寫函式時。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`引數可讓您控制是否函式會將字串解譯為變數或固定的長度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 引數時，會將寫入的長度描述元`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`具有`FilePut`，您必須執行相同的`FileGet`，而且您必須確定該字串會初始化為預期的長度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 隨機的模式Random Mode 在開啟的檔案的`Random`模式中，適用下列規則：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果正在寫入資料的長度小於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FilePut`將後續的記錄寫入記錄長度界限上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 檔案緩衝區的現有內容填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因為無法任何確定地決定填補資料的數量，通常是個不錯的主意，具有符合要寫入的資料長度的記錄長度。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果正在寫入資料的長度大於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，將會擲回例外狀況。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果寫入的變數是字串，`FilePut`寫入雙位元組描述元包含字串的長度，並再寫入變數的資料。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果要寫入的變數是物件，包含數值的型別，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組，識別`VarType`物件的然後將寫入的變數。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 比方說，撰寫物件時，包含整數`FilePut`寫入 6 個位元組： 識別做為物件的兩個位元組`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 和包含資料的四個位元組。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於實際儲存變數所需的位元組數目。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果寫入的變數是包含字串、 物件`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組描述元，識別`VarType(8)`的物件，表示的字串，然後再寫入字串資料長度的雙位元組描述元。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在四個位元組大於字串的實際長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果您想要將描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，而您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果寫入的變數陣列，您會有關於要寫入的大小和陣列維度的描述元的選擇。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和更早版本撰寫的動態陣列，但不是會為固定大小陣列的檔案描述項。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 預設為不寫入描述項。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要寫入的描述元，將`ArrayIsDynamic`參數來`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在撰寫時的陣列，您必須比對會讀取陣列; 的方式它會讀取具有描述元，如果您有寫入描述項。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其長度等於 2，再加上 8 倍的維度數目: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於要寫入的陣列資料和陣列描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 比方說，下列陣列宣告需要 218 的位元組陣列寫入至磁碟。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果要寫入的變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FilePut`寫入變數的資料。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於所寫入的資料長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 如同寫入每個個別但沒有任何項目之間的填補，將結構的項目。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中的結構，表示字串寫入時的大小到磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字串已超過所指定位元組數目的欄位`VBFixedString`屬性會被截斷時寫入至磁碟，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式規則的套用，但有些例外狀況。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式與不同的規則`Random`模式︰The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 將所有的變數，連續地寫入磁碟，也就是沒有記錄之間的填補。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FilePut`寫入的資料。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 會不寫入任何描述項。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 寫入不是雙位元組長度描述項的結構元素的可變長度的字串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 寫入的位元組數目等於字串中的字元數目。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下列陳述式會將 11 個位元組寫入檔案編號 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 寫入檔案，使用`FilePut`函式需要`Write`從存取列舉型別。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`FilePut`函式，將資料寫入檔案。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 結構的五筆記錄`Person`會寫入至檔案。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

如果寫入的變數陣列，您會有關於要寫入的大小和陣列維度的描述元的選擇。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和更早版本撰寫的動態陣列，但不是會為固定大小陣列的檔案描述項。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 預設為不寫入描述項。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要寫入的描述元，將`ArrayIsDynamic`參數來`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在撰寫時的陣列，您必須比對會讀取陣列; 的方式它會讀取具有描述元，如果您有寫入描述項。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其長度等於 2，再加上 8 倍的維度數目: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於要寫入的陣列資料和陣列描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 比方說，下列陣列宣告需要 218 的位元組陣列寫入至磁碟。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果要寫入的變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FilePut`寫入變數的資料。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於所寫入的資料長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 如同寫入每個個別但沒有任何項目之間的填補，將結構的項目。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中的結構，表示字串寫入時的大小到磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字串已超過所指定位元組數目的欄位`VBFixedString`屬性會被截斷時寫入至磁碟，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式規則的套用，但有些例外狀況。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式與不同的規則`Random`模式︰The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 將所有的變數，連續地寫入磁碟，也就是沒有記錄之間的填補。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FilePut`寫入的資料。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 會不寫入任何描述項。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 寫入不是雙位元組長度描述項的結構元素的可變長度的字串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 寫入的位元組數目等於字串中的字元數目。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下列陳述式會將 11 個位元組寫入檔案編號 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 寫入檔案，使用`FilePut`函式需要`Write`從存取列舉型別。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`FilePut`函式，將資料寫入檔案。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 結構的五筆記錄`Person`會寫入至檔案。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

span.span: Writing to Files in Visual Basic

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, char Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, char Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As Char, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FilePut : int * char * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效的變數名稱，該名稱包含已寫入磁碟的資料。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 寫入開始的資料錄數目 ( 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 ( 模式檔案)。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: 將變數資料寫入磁碟檔案。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相較於 ， 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 只有在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 使用 `FilePut` 寫入的資料，通常會透過使用 `FileGet` 從檔案讀取。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組在位置 1，第二個資料錄或位元組位於位置 2，依此類推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果您省略`RecordNumber`下, 一個資料錄或最後一個之後的位元組`FileGet`或是`FilePut`函式，或指向最後一個`Seek`撰寫函式時。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`引數可讓您控制是否函式會將字串解譯為變數或固定的長度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 引數時，會將寫入的長度描述元`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`具有`FilePut`，您必須執行相同的`FileGet`，而且您必須確定該字串會初始化為預期的長度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 隨機的模式Random Mode 在開啟的檔案的`Random`模式中，適用下列規則：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果正在寫入資料的長度小於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FilePut`將後續的記錄寫入記錄長度界限上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 檔案緩衝區的現有內容填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因為無法任何確定地決定填補資料的數量，通常是個不錯的主意，具有符合要寫入的資料長度的記錄長度。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果正在寫入資料的長度大於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，將會擲回例外狀況。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果寫入的變數是字串，`FilePut`寫入雙位元組描述元包含字串的長度，並再寫入變數的資料。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果要寫入的變數是物件，包含數值的型別，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組，識別`VarType`物件的然後將寫入的變數。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 比方說，撰寫物件時，包含整數`FilePut`寫入 6 個位元組： 識別做為物件的兩個位元組`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 和包含資料的四個位元組。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於實際儲存變數所需的位元組數目。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果寫入的變數是包含字串、 物件`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組描述元，識別`VarType(8)`的物件，表示的字串，然後再寫入字串資料長度的雙位元組描述元。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在四個位元組大於字串的實際長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果您想要將描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，而您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果寫入的變數陣列，您會有關於要寫入的大小和陣列維度的描述元的選擇。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和更早版本撰寫的動態陣列，但不是會為固定大小陣列的檔案描述項。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 預設為不寫入描述項。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要寫入的描述元，將`ArrayIsDynamic`參數來`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在撰寫時的陣列，您必須比對會讀取陣列; 的方式它會讀取具有描述元，如果您有寫入描述項。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其長度等於 2，再加上 8 倍的維度數目: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於要寫入的陣列資料和陣列描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 比方說，下列陣列宣告需要 218 的位元組陣列寫入至磁碟。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果要寫入的變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FilePut`寫入變數的資料。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於所寫入的資料長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 如同寫入每個個別但沒有任何項目之間的填補，將結構的項目。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中的結構，表示字串寫入時的大小到磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字串已超過所指定位元組數目的欄位`VBFixedString`屬性會被截斷時寫入至磁碟，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式規則的套用，但有些例外狀況。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式與不同的規則`Random`模式︰The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 將所有的變數，連續地寫入磁碟，也就是沒有記錄之間的填補。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FilePut`寫入的資料。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 會不寫入任何描述項。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 寫入不是雙位元組長度描述項的結構元素的可變長度的字串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 寫入的位元組數目等於字串中的字元數目。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下列陳述式會將 11 個位元組寫入檔案編號 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 寫入檔案，使用`FilePut`函式需要`Write`從存取列舉型別。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`FilePut`函式，將資料寫入檔案。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 結構的五筆記錄`Person`會寫入至檔案。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

如果要寫入的變數是物件，包含數值的型別，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組，識別`VarType`物件的然後將寫入的變數。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 比方說，撰寫物件時，包含整數`FilePut`寫入 6 個位元組： 識別做為物件的兩個位元組`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 和包含資料的四個位元組。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於實際儲存變數所需的位元組數目。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果寫入的變數是包含字串、 物件`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組描述元，識別`VarType(8)`的物件，表示的字串，然後再寫入字串資料長度的雙位元組描述元。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在四個位元組大於字串的實際長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果您想要將描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，而您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果寫入的變數陣列，您會有關於要寫入的大小和陣列維度的描述元的選擇。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和更早版本撰寫的動態陣列，但不是會為固定大小陣列的檔案描述項。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 預設為不寫入描述項。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要寫入的描述元，將`ArrayIsDynamic`參數來`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在撰寫時的陣列，您必須比對會讀取陣列; 的方式它會讀取具有描述元，如果您有寫入描述項。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其長度等於 2，再加上 8 倍的維度數目: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於要寫入的陣列資料和陣列描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 比方說，下列陣列宣告需要 218 的位元組陣列寫入至磁碟。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果要寫入的變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FilePut`寫入變數的資料。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於所寫入的資料長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 如同寫入每個個別但沒有任何項目之間的填補，將結構的項目。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中的結構，表示字串寫入時的大小到磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字串已超過所指定位元組數目的欄位`VBFixedString`屬性會被截斷時寫入至磁碟，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式規則的套用，但有些例外狀況。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式與不同的規則`Random`模式︰The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 將所有的變數，連續地寫入磁碟，也就是沒有記錄之間的填補。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FilePut`寫入的資料。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 會不寫入任何描述項。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 寫入不是雙位元組長度描述項的結構元素的可變長度的字串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 寫入的位元組數目等於字串中的字元數目。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下列陳述式會將 11 個位元組寫入檔案編號 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 寫入檔案，使用`FilePut`函式需要`Write`從存取列舉型別。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`FilePut`函式，將資料寫入檔案。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 結構的五筆記錄`Person`會寫入至檔案。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

span.span: Writing to Files in Visual Basic

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, decimal Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, valuetype System.Decimal Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As Decimal, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FilePut : int * decimal * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效的變數名稱，該名稱包含已寫入磁碟的資料。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 寫入開始的資料錄數目 ( 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 ( 模式檔案)。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: 將變數資料寫入磁碟檔案。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相較於 ， 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 只有在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 使用 `FilePut` 寫入的資料，通常會透過使用 `FileGet` 從檔案讀取。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組在位置 1，第二個資料錄或位元組位於位置 2，依此類推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果您省略`RecordNumber`下, 一個資料錄或最後一個之後的位元組`FileGet`或是`FilePut`函式，或指向最後一個`Seek`撰寫函式時。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`引數可讓您控制是否函式會將字串解譯為變數或固定的長度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 引數時，會將寫入的長度描述元`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`具有`FilePut`，您必須執行相同的`FileGet`，而且您必須確定該字串會初始化為預期的長度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 隨機的模式Random Mode 在開啟的檔案的`Random`模式中，適用下列規則：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果正在寫入資料的長度小於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FilePut`將後續的記錄寫入記錄長度界限上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 檔案緩衝區的現有內容填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因為無法任何確定地決定填補資料的數量，通常是個不錯的主意，具有符合要寫入的資料長度的記錄長度。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果正在寫入資料的長度大於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，將會擲回例外狀況。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果寫入的變數是字串，`FilePut`寫入雙位元組描述元包含字串的長度，並再寫入變數的資料。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果要寫入的變數是物件，包含數值的型別，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組，識別`VarType`物件的然後將寫入的變數。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 比方說，撰寫物件時，包含整數`FilePut`寫入 6 個位元組： 識別做為物件的兩個位元組`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 和包含資料的四個位元組。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於實際儲存變數所需的位元組數目。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果寫入的變數是包含字串、 物件`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組描述元，識別`VarType(8)`的物件，表示的字串，然後再寫入字串資料長度的雙位元組描述元。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在四個位元組大於字串的實際長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果您想要將描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，而您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果寫入的變數陣列，您會有關於要寫入的大小和陣列維度的描述元的選擇。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和更早版本撰寫的動態陣列，但不是會為固定大小陣列的檔案描述項。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 預設為不寫入描述項。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要寫入的描述元，將`ArrayIsDynamic`參數來`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在撰寫時的陣列，您必須比對會讀取陣列; 的方式它會讀取具有描述元，如果您有寫入描述項。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其長度等於 2，再加上 8 倍的維度數目: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於要寫入的陣列資料和陣列描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 比方說，下列陣列宣告需要 218 的位元組陣列寫入至磁碟。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果要寫入的變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FilePut`寫入變數的資料。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於所寫入的資料長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 如同寫入每個個別但沒有任何項目之間的填補，將結構的項目。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中的結構，表示字串寫入時的大小到磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字串已超過所指定位元組數目的欄位`VBFixedString`屬性會被截斷時寫入至磁碟，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式規則的套用，但有些例外狀況。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式與不同的規則`Random`模式︰The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - 如果正在寫入資料的長度小於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FilePut`將後續的記錄寫入記錄長度界限上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 檔案緩衝區的現有內容填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因為無法任何確定地決定填補資料的數量，通常是個不錯的主意，具有符合要寫入的資料長度的記錄長度。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果正在寫入資料的長度大於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，將會擲回例外狀況。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果寫入的變數是字串，`FilePut`寫入雙位元組描述元包含字串的長度，並再寫入變數的資料。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果要寫入的變數是物件，包含數值的型別，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組，識別`VarType`物件的然後將寫入的變數。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 比方說，撰寫物件時，包含整數`FilePut`寫入 6 個位元組： 識別做為物件的兩個位元組`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 和包含資料的四個位元組。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於實際儲存變數所需的位元組數目。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果寫入的變數是包含字串、 物件`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組描述元，識別`VarType(8)`的物件，表示的字串，然後再寫入字串資料長度的雙位元組描述元。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在四個位元組大於字串的實際長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果您想要將描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，而您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果寫入的變數陣列，您會有關於要寫入的大小和陣列維度的描述元的選擇。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和更早版本撰寫的動態陣列，但不是會為固定大小陣列的檔案描述項。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 預設為不寫入描述項。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要寫入的描述元，將`ArrayIsDynamic`參數來`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在撰寫時的陣列，您必須比對會讀取陣列; 的方式它會讀取具有描述元，如果您有寫入描述項。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其長度等於 2，再加上 8 倍的維度數目: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於要寫入的陣列資料和陣列描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 比方說，下列陣列宣告需要 218 的位元組陣列寫入至磁碟。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果要寫入的變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FilePut`寫入變數的資料。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於所寫入的資料長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 如同寫入每個個別但沒有任何項目之間的填補，將結構的項目。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中的結構，表示字串寫入時的大小到磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字串已超過所指定位元組數目的欄位`VBFixedString`屬性會被截斷時寫入至磁碟，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式規則的套用，但有些例外狀況。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式與不同的規則`Random`模式︰The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 將所有的變數，連續地寫入磁碟，也就是沒有記錄之間的填補。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FilePut`寫入的資料。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 會不寫入任何描述項。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 寫入不是雙位元組長度描述項的結構元素的可變長度的字串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 寫入的位元組數目等於字串中的字元數目。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下列陳述式會將 11 個位元組寫入檔案編號 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 寫入檔案，使用`FilePut`函式需要`Write`從存取列舉型別。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`FilePut`函式，將資料寫入檔案。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 結構的五筆記錄`Person`會寫入至檔案。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

span.span: Writing to Files in Visual Basic

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, short Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, int16 Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As Short, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FilePut : int * int16 * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效的變數名稱，該名稱包含已寫入磁碟的資料。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 寫入開始的資料錄數目 ( 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 ( 模式檔案)。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: 將變數資料寫入磁碟檔案。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相較於 ， 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 只有在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 使用 `FilePut` 寫入的資料，通常會透過使用 `FileGet` 從檔案讀取。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組在位置 1，第二個資料錄或位元組位於位置 2，依此類推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果您省略`RecordNumber`下, 一個資料錄或最後一個之後的位元組`FileGet`或是`FilePut`函式，或指向最後一個`Seek`撰寫函式時。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`引數可讓您控制是否函式會將字串解譯為變數或固定的長度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 引數時，會將寫入的長度描述元`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`具有`FilePut`，您必須執行相同的`FileGet`，而且您必須確定該字串會初始化為預期的長度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 隨機的模式Random Mode 在開啟的檔案的`Random`模式中，適用下列規則：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果正在寫入資料的長度小於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FilePut`將後續的記錄寫入記錄長度界限上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 檔案緩衝區的現有內容填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因為無法任何確定地決定填補資料的數量，通常是個不錯的主意，具有符合要寫入的資料長度的記錄長度。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果正在寫入資料的長度大於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，將會擲回例外狀況。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果要寫入的變數是物件，包含數值的型別，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組，識別`VarType`物件的然後將寫入的變數。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 比方說，撰寫物件時，包含整數`FilePut`寫入 6 個位元組： 識別做為物件的兩個位元組`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 和包含資料的四個位元組。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於實際儲存變數所需的位元組數目。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果寫入的變數是包含字串、 物件`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組描述元，識別`VarType(8)`的物件，表示的字串，然後再寫入字串資料長度的雙位元組描述元。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the`VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在四個位元組大於字串的實際長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果您想要將描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，而您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 只有在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 使用 `FilePut` 寫入的資料，通常會透過使用 `FileGet` 從檔案讀取。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組在位置 1，第二個資料錄或位元組位於位置 2，依此類推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果您省略`RecordNumber`下, 一個資料錄或最後一個之後的位元組`FileGet`或是`FilePut`函式，或指向最後一個`Seek`撰寫函式時。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`引數可讓您控制是否函式會將字串解譯為變數或固定的長度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 引數時，會將寫入的長度描述元`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`具有`FilePut`，您必須執行相同的`FileGet`，而且您必須確定該字串會初始化為預期的長度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 隨機的模式Random Mode 在開啟的檔案的`Random`模式中，適用下列規則：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果正在寫入資料的長度小於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FilePut`將後續的記錄寫入記錄長度界限上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 檔案緩衝區的現有內容填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因為無法任何確定地決定填補資料的數量，通常是個不錯的主意，具有符合要寫入的資料長度的記錄長度。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果正在寫入資料的長度大於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，將會擲回例外狀況。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果寫入的變數是字串，`FilePut`寫入雙位元組描述元包含字串的長度，並再寫入變數的資料。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果要寫入的變數是物件，包含數值的型別，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組，識別`VarType`物件的然後將寫入的變數。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 比方說，撰寫物件時，包含整數`FilePut`寫入 6 個位元組： 識別做為物件的兩個位元組`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 和包含資料的四個位元組。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於實際儲存變數所需的位元組數目。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果寫入的變數是包含字串、 物件`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組描述元，識別`VarType(8)`的物件，表示的字串，然後再寫入字串資料長度的雙位元組描述元。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在四個位元組大於字串的實際長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果您想要將描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，而您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果寫入的變數陣列，您會有關於要寫入的大小和陣列維度的描述元的選擇。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和更早版本撰寫的動態陣列，但不是會為固定大小陣列的檔案描述項。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 預設為不寫入描述項。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要寫入的描述元，將`ArrayIsDynamic`參數來`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在撰寫時的陣列，您必須比對會讀取陣列; 的方式它會讀取具有描述元，如果您有寫入描述項。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其長度等於 2，再加上 8 倍的維度數目: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於要寫入的陣列資料和陣列描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 比方說，下列陣列宣告需要 218 的位元組陣列寫入至磁碟。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果要寫入的變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FilePut`寫入變數的資料。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於所寫入的資料長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 如同寫入每個個別但沒有任何項目之間的填補，將結構的項目。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中的結構，表示字串寫入時的大小到磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字串已超過所指定位元組數目的欄位`VBFixedString`屬性會被截斷時寫入至磁碟，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式規則的套用，但有些例外狀況。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式與不同的規則`Random`模式︰The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 將所有的變數，連續地寫入磁碟，也就是沒有記錄之間的填補。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FilePut`寫入的資料。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 會不寫入任何描述項。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 寫入不是雙位元組長度描述項的結構元素的可變長度的字串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 寫入的位元組數目等於字串中的字元數目。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下列陳述式會將 11 個位元組寫入檔案編號 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 寫入檔案，使用`FilePut`函式需要`Write`從存取列舉型別。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`FilePut`函式，將資料寫入檔案。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 結構的五筆記錄`Person`會寫入至檔案。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

related.span: 在 Visual Basic 中寫入檔案

span.span: Writing to Files in Visual Basic

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, long Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, int64 Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As Long, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FilePut : int * int64 * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效的變數名稱，該名稱包含已寫入磁碟的資料。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 寫入開始的資料錄數目 ( 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 ( 模式檔案)。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: 將變數資料寫入磁碟檔案。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相較於 ， 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, float Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, float32 Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As Single, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FilePut : int * single * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效的變數名稱，該名稱包含已寫入磁碟的資料。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 寫入開始的資料錄數目 ( 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 ( 模式檔案)。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: 將變數資料寫入磁碟檔案。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 只有在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 使用 `FilePut` 寫入的資料，通常會透過使用 `FileGet` 從檔案讀取。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組在位置 1，第二個資料錄或位元組位於位置 2，依此類推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果您省略`RecordNumber`下, 一個資料錄或最後一個之後的位元組`FileGet`或是`FilePut`函式，或指向最後一個`Seek`撰寫函式時。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`引數可讓您控制是否函式會將字串解譯為變數或固定的長度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 引數時，會將寫入的長度描述元`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`具有`FilePut`，您必須執行相同的`FileGet`，而且您必須確定該字串會初始化為預期的長度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 隨機的模式Random Mode 在開啟的檔案的`Random`模式中，適用下列規則：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果正在寫入資料的長度小於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FilePut`將後續的記錄寫入記錄長度界限上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 檔案緩衝區的現有內容填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因為無法任何確定地決定填補資料的數量，通常是個不錯的主意，具有符合要寫入的資料長度的記錄長度。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果正在寫入資料的長度大於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，將會擲回例外狀況。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果寫入的變數是字串，`FilePut`寫入雙位元組描述元包含字串的長度，並再寫入變數的資料。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果要寫入的變數是物件，包含數值的型別，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組，識別`VarType`物件的然後將寫入的變數。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 比方說，撰寫物件時，包含整數`FilePut`寫入 6 個位元組： 識別做為物件的兩個位元組`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 和包含資料的四個位元組。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於實際儲存變數所需的位元組數目。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果寫入的變數是包含字串、 物件`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組描述元，識別`VarType(8)`的物件，表示的字串，然後再寫入字串資料長度的雙位元組描述元。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在四個位元組大於字串的實際長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果您想要將描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，而您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果寫入的變數陣列，您會有關於要寫入的大小和陣列維度的描述元的選擇。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和更早版本撰寫的動態陣列，但不是會為固定大小陣列的檔案描述項。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 預設為不寫入描述項。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要寫入的描述元，將`ArrayIsDynamic`參數來`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在撰寫時的陣列，您必須比對會讀取陣列; 的方式它會讀取具有描述元，如果您有寫入描述項。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其長度等於 2，再加上 8 倍的維度數目: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於要寫入的陣列資料和陣列描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 比方說，下列陣列宣告需要 218 的位元組陣列寫入至磁碟。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果要寫入的變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FilePut`寫入變數的資料。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於所寫入的資料長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 如同寫入每個個別但沒有任何項目之間的填補，將結構的項目。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中的結構，表示字串寫入時的大小到磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字串已超過所指定位元組數目的欄位`VBFixedString`屬性會被截斷時寫入至磁碟，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式規則的套用，但有些例外狀況。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式與不同的規則`Random`模式︰The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 將所有的變數，連續地寫入磁碟，也就是沒有記錄之間的填補。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FilePut`寫入的資料。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 會不寫入任何描述項。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 寫入不是雙位元組長度描述項的結構元素的可變長度的字串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 寫入的位元組數目等於字串中的字元數目。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下列陳述式會將 11 個位元組寫入檔案編號 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 寫入檔案，使用`FilePut`函式需要`Write`從存取列舉型別。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`FilePut`函式，將資料寫入檔案。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 結構的五筆記錄`Person`會寫入至檔案。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

related.span: 在 Visual Basic 中寫入檔案

span.span: Writing to Files in Visual Basic

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, ValueType Value, long RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, class System.ValueType Value, int64 RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As ValueType, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1)
static member FilePut : int * ValueType * int64 -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效的變數名稱，該名稱包含已寫入磁碟的資料。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 寫入開始的資料錄數目 ( 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 ( 模式檔案)。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: 將變數資料寫入磁碟檔案。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相較於 ， 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。
