MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (object FileNumber, object Value, object RecordNumber = -1);
.method public static void FilePut(object FileNumber, object Value, object RecordNumber) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Object, Value As Object, Optional RecordNumber As Object = -1)
static member FilePut : obj * obj * obj -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This member has been deprecated. Please use FilePutObject to write Object types, or coerce FileNumber and RecordNumber to Integer for writing non-Object types. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")
System.Obsolete("Use FilePutObject to write Object types, or coerce FileNumber and RecordNumber to Integer for writing non-Object types")

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效的變數名稱，該名稱包含已寫入磁碟的資料。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 寫入開始的資料錄數目 ( 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 ( 模式檔案)。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

summary.span: 將變數資料寫入磁碟檔案。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相較於 ， 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 只有在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 使用 `FilePut` 寫入的資料，通常會透過使用 `FileGet` 從檔案讀取。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組在位置 1，第二個資料錄或位元組位於位置 2，依此類推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果您省略`RecordNumber`下, 一個資料錄或最後一個之後的位元組`FileGet`或是`FilePut`函式，或指向最後一個`Seek`撰寫函式時。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`引數可讓您控制是否函式會將字串解譯為變數或固定的長度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 引數時，會將寫入的長度描述元`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`具有`FilePut`，您必須執行相同的`FileGet`，而且您必須確定該字串會初始化為預期的長度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 隨機的模式Random Mode 在開啟的檔案的`Random`模式中，適用下列規則：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果正在寫入資料的長度小於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FilePut`將後續的記錄寫入記錄長度界限上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 檔案緩衝區的現有內容填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因為無法任何確定地決定填補資料的數量，通常是個不錯的主意，具有符合要寫入的資料長度的記錄長度。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果正在寫入資料的長度大於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，將會擲回例外狀況。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果寫入的變數是字串，`FilePut`寫入雙位元組描述元包含字串的長度，並再寫入變數的資料。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果要寫入的變數是物件，包含數值的型別，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組，識別`VarType`物件的然後將寫入的變數。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 比方說，撰寫物件時，包含整數`FilePut`寫入 6 個位元組： 識別做為物件的兩個位元組`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 和包含資料的四個位元組。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於實際儲存變數所需的位元組數目。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果寫入的變數是包含字串、 物件`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組描述元，識別`VarType(8)`的物件，表示的字串，然後再寫入字串資料長度的雙位元組描述元。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在四個位元組大於字串的實際長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果您想要將描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，而您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果寫入的變數陣列，您會有關於要寫入的大小和陣列維度的描述元的選擇。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和更早版本撰寫的動態陣列，但不是會為固定大小陣列的檔案描述項。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 預設為不寫入描述項。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要寫入的描述元，將`ArrayIsDynamic`參數來`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在撰寫時的陣列，您必須比對會讀取陣列; 的方式它會讀取具有描述元，如果您有寫入描述項。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其長度等於 2，再加上 8 倍的維度數目: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於要寫入的陣列資料和陣列描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 比方說，下列陣列宣告需要 218 的位元組陣列寫入至磁碟。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果要寫入的變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FilePut`寫入變數的資料。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於所寫入的資料長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 如同寫入每個個別但沒有任何項目之間的填補，將結構的項目。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中的結構，表示字串寫入時的大小到磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字串已超過所指定位元組數目的欄位`VBFixedString`屬性會被截斷時寫入至磁碟，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式規則的套用，但有些例外狀況。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式與不同的規則`Random`模式︰The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 將所有的變數，連續地寫入磁碟，也就是沒有記錄之間的填補。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FilePut`寫入的資料。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 會不寫入任何描述項。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 寫入不是雙位元組長度描述項的結構元素的可變長度的字串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 寫入的位元組數目等於字串中的字元數目。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下列陳述式會將 11 個位元組寫入檔案編號 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 寫入檔案，使用`FilePut`函式需要`Write`從存取列舉型別。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`FilePut`函式，將資料寫入檔案。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 結構的五筆記錄`Person`會寫入至檔案。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

related.span: 在 Visual Basic 中寫入檔案

span.span: Writing to Files in Visual Basic

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, string Value, long RecordNumber = -1, bool StringIsFixedLength = false);
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, string Value, int64 RecordNumber, bool StringIsFixedLength) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As String, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1, Optional StringIsFixedLength As Boolean = false)
static member FilePut : int * string * int64 * bool -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效的變數名稱，該名稱包含已寫入磁碟的資料。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 寫入開始的資料錄數目 ( 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 ( 模式檔案)。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

param.name: StringIsFixedLength
param.span: 只有在編寫字串時才適用。

span.span: Applies only when writing a string.

param.span: 指定是否要針對檔案的字串編寫二位元組字串長度的描述元。

span.span: Specifies whether to write a two-byte string length descriptor for the string to the file.

summary.span: 將變數資料寫入磁碟檔案。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相較於 ， 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FilePut (int FileNumber, Array Value, long RecordNumber = -1, bool ArrayIsDynamic = false, bool StringIsFixedLength = false);
.method public static void FilePut(int32 FileNumber, class System.Array Value, int64 RecordNumber, bool ArrayIsDynamic, bool StringIsFixedLength) cil managed
Public Sub FilePut (FileNumber As Integer, Value As Array, Optional RecordNumber As Long = -1, Optional ArrayIsDynamic As Boolean = false, Optional StringIsFixedLength As Boolean = false)
static member FilePut : int * Array * int64 * bool * bool -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 有效的變數名稱，該名稱包含已寫入磁碟的資料。

span.span: Valid variable name that contains data written to disk.

param.name: RecordNumber
param.span: 寫入開始的資料錄數目 ( 模式檔案) 或位元組數目 ( 模式檔案)。

span.span: Record number ( mode files) or byte number ( mode files) at which writing starts.

param.name: ArrayIsDynamic
param.span: 只有在編寫陣列時才適用。

span.span: Applies only when writing an array.

param.span: 指定陣列是否要視為動態 (Dynamic)，以及是否要針對描述長度的字串編寫陣列描述元。

span.span: Specifies whether the array is to be treated as dynamic, and whether to write an array descriptor for the string that describes the length.

param.name: StringIsFixedLength
param.span: 只有在編寫字串時才適用。

span.span: Applies only when writing a string.

param.span: 指定是否要針對檔案的字串編寫二位元組字串長度的描述元。

span.span: Specifies whether to write a two-byte string length descriptor for the string to the file.

summary.span: 將變數資料寫入磁碟檔案。

span.span: Writes data from a variable to a disk file.

summary.span: 相較於 ， 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePut` 只有在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePut` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 使用 `FilePut` 寫入的資料，通常會透過使用 `FileGet` 從檔案讀取。Data written with `FilePut` is usually read from a file by using `FileGet`. 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組在位置 1，第二個資料錄或位元組位於位置 2，依此類推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果您省略`RecordNumber`下, 一個資料錄或最後一個之後的位元組`FileGet`或是`FilePut`函式，或指向最後一個`Seek`撰寫函式時。If you omit `RecordNumber`, the next record or byte after the last `FileGet` or `FilePut` function or pointed to by the last `Seek` function is written. `StringIsFixedLength`引數可讓您控制是否函式會將字串解譯為變數或固定的長度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePut` 引數時，會將寫入的長度描述元`True`。`FilePut` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`具有`FilePut`，您必須執行相同的`FileGet`，而且您必須確定該字串會初始化為預期的長度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePut`, you have to do the same with `FileGet`, and you have to make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 隨機的模式Random Mode 在開啟的檔案的`Random`模式中，適用下列規則：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果正在寫入資料的長度小於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FilePut`將後續的記錄寫入記錄長度界限上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePut` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 檔案緩衝區的現有內容填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 因為無法任何確定地決定填補資料的數量，通常是個不錯的主意，具有符合要寫入的資料長度的記錄長度。Because the amount of padding data cannot be determined with any certainty, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果正在寫入資料的長度大於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，將會擲回例外狀況。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception will be thrown. - 如果寫入的變數是字串，`FilePut`寫入雙位元組描述元包含字串的長度，並再寫入變數的資料。If the variable being written is a string, `FilePut` writes a two-byte descriptor that contains the string length, and then writes the data that goes into the variable. 因此，所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於字串的實際長度。Therefore, the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual length of the string. - 如果要寫入的變數是物件，包含數值的型別，`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組，識別`VarType`物件的然後將寫入的變數。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePut` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 比方說，撰寫物件時，包含整數`FilePut`寫入 6 個位元組： 識別做為物件的兩個位元組`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 和包含資料的四個位元組。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePut` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於實際儲存變數所需的位元組數目。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果寫入的變數是包含字串、 物件`FilePut`寫入兩個位元組描述元，識別`VarType(8)`的物件，表示的字串，然後再寫入字串資料長度的雙位元組描述元。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePut` writes a two byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在四個位元組大於字串的實際長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果您想要將描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，而您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果寫入的變數陣列，您會有關於要寫入的大小和陣列維度的描述元的選擇。If the variable being written is an array, you have a choice as to whether or not to write a descriptor for the size and dimensions of the array. Visual Basic 6.0 和更早版本撰寫的動態陣列，但不是會為固定大小陣列的檔案描述項。Visual Basic 6.0 and earlier versions write the file descriptor for a dynamic array but not for a fixed-size array. Visual Basic 2005 預設為不寫入描述項。Visual Basic 2005 defaults to not writing the descriptor. 若要寫入的描述元，將`ArrayIsDynamic`參數來`True`。To write the descriptor, set the `ArrayIsDynamic` parameter to `True`. 在撰寫時的陣列，您必須比對會讀取陣列; 的方式它會讀取具有描述元，如果您有寫入描述項。When writing the array, you have to match the way the array will be read; if it will be read with the descriptor, you have to write the descriptor. 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其長度等於 2，再加上 8 倍的維度數目: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於要寫入的陣列資料和陣列描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 比方說，下列陣列宣告需要 218 的位元組陣列寫入至磁碟。For example, the following array declaration requires 218 bytes when the array is written to disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#43](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#43)] - 如果要寫入的變數是任何其他類型的變數 （不可變長度字串或物件）`FilePut`寫入變數的資料。If the variable being written is any other type of variable (not a variable-length string or an object), `FilePut` writes only the variable data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於所寫入的資料長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the length of the data being written. - `FilePut` 如同寫入每個個別但沒有任何項目之間的填補，將結構的項目。`FilePut` writes elements of structures as if each were written individually, except there is no padding between elements. `VBFixedString`屬性可以套用至字串欄位中的結構，表示字串寫入時的大小到磁碟。The `VBFixedString` attribute can be applied to string fields in the structures to indicate the size of the string when written to disk. > [!NOTE] > 字串已超過所指定位元組數目的欄位`VBFixedString`屬性會被截斷時寫入至磁碟，String fields that have more bytes than specified by the `VBFixedString` attribute are truncated when written to disk, ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，大部分的`Random`模式規則的套用，但有些例外狀況。For files opened in `Binary` mode, most of the `Random` mode rules apply, with some exceptions. 在中開啟檔案的下列規則`Binary`模式與不同的規則`Random`模式︰The following rules for files opened in `Binary` mode differ from the rules for `Random` mode: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePut` 將所有的變數，連續地寫入磁碟，也就是沒有記錄之間的填補。`FilePut` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. - 在結構中，陣列以外的所有陣列`FilePut`寫入的資料。For any array other than an array in a structure, `FilePut` writes only the data. 會不寫入任何描述項。No descriptor is written. - `FilePut` 寫入不是雙位元組長度描述項的結構元素的可變長度的字串。`FilePut` writes variable-length strings that are not elements of structures without the two-byte length descriptor. 寫入的位元組數目等於字串中的字元數目。The number of bytes written equals the number of characters in the string. 例如，下列陳述式會將 11 個位元組寫入檔案編號 1:For example, the following statements write 11 bytes to file number 1: [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#44](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#44)] - 寫入檔案，使用`FilePut`函式需要`Write`從存取列舉型別。Writing to a file by using the `FilePut` function requires `Write` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`FilePut`函式，將資料寫入檔案。This example uses the `FilePut` function to write data to a file. 結構的五筆記錄`Person`會寫入至檔案。Five records of the structure `Person` are written to the file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#42)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FilePutObject`而不是使用函式`FilePut`若要避免模稜兩可在編譯時期，如果型別`Object`傳遞，而另一個類型，例如`Integer`， `Long`， `Short`，依此類推。The `FilePutObject` function is used instead of `FilePut` to avoid ambiguities at compile time if type `Object` is passed instead of another type, such as `Integer`, `Long`, `Short`, and so forth. `FilePutObject` 寫入，並讀取描述物件的描述元。`FilePutObject` writes and reads descriptors that describe the object. 如果您想要寫出`Variant`型別，`FilePutObject`需要。If you intend to write out the `Variant` type, `FilePutObject` is required. 如有疑問，如果您使用物件來作為第二個參數，我們建議您一律使用`FilePutObject`和`FileGetObject`。When in doubt, if you are using an object for the second parameter, we recommend that you always use `FilePutObject` and `FileGetObject`. `FilePutObject` 只有在有效`Random`和`Binary`模式。`FilePutObject` is valid only in `Random` and `Binary` mode. 使用 `FilePutObject` 寫入的資料，通常會透過使用 `FileGetObject` 從檔案讀取。Data written with `FilePutObject` is usually read from a file by using `FileGetObject`. 第一個記錄或檔案中的位元組在位置 1，第二個資料錄或位元組位於位置 2，依此類推。The first record or byte in a file is at position 1, the second record or byte is at position 2, and so on. 如果您省略`RecordNumber`，`FilePutObject`寫入最後一個之後的下一步 的資料錄或位元組`FileGetObject`或是`FilePutObject`函式 (或資料錄或位元組所指的最後一個`Seek`函式)。If you omit `RecordNumber`, `FilePutObject` writes the next record or byte after the last `FileGetObject` or `FilePutObject` function (or the record or byte pointed to by the last `Seek` function). `StringIsFixedLength`引數可讓您控制是否函式會將字串解譯為變數或固定的長度。The `StringIsFixedLength` argument controls whether the function interprets strings as variable or fixed length. `FilePutObject` 引數時，會將寫入的長度描述元`True`。`FilePutObject` does not write the length descriptor when the argument is `True`. 如果您使用`StringIsFixedLength` = `True`具有`FilePutObject`，您必須執行相同的`FileGetObject`，和您也必須確定該字串會初始化為預期的長度。If you use `StringIsFixedLength` = `True` with `FilePutObject`, you have to do the same with `FileGetObject`, and you must also make sure that the string is initialized to the length expected. ## 隨機的模式Random Mode 在開啟的檔案的`Random`模式中，適用下列規則：For files opened in `Random` mode, the following rules apply: - 如果正在寫入資料的長度小於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式，`FilePutObject`將後續的記錄寫入記錄長度界限上。If the length of the data being written is less than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, `FilePutObject` writes subsequent records on record-length boundaries. 檔案緩衝區的現有內容填補一筆記錄的結尾與下一筆記錄的開始之間的空間。The space between the end of one record and the start of the next record is padded with the existing contents of the file buffer. 填補資料的數量無法精確地判斷，因為它通常是個不錯的主意，具有符合要寫入的資料長度的記錄長度。Because the amount of padding data cannot be precisely determined, it is generally a good idea to have the record length match the length of the data being written. 如果正在寫入資料的長度大於指定的長度`RecordLength`子句`FileOpen`函式擲回例外狀況。If the length of the data being written is greater than the length specified in the `RecordLength` clause of the `FileOpen` function, an exception is thrown. - 如果要寫入的變數是物件，包含數值的型別，`FilePutObject`寫入兩個位元組，識別`VarType`物件的然後將寫入的變數。If the variable being written is an object that contains a numeric type, `FilePutObject` writes two bytes identifying the `VarType` of the object and then writes the variable. 比方說，撰寫物件時，包含整數`FilePutObject`寫入 6 個位元組： 識別做為物件的兩個位元組`VarType(3)`(`Integer`) 和包含資料的四個位元組。For example, when writing an object that contains an integer, `FilePutObject` writes six bytes: two bytes that identify the object as `VarType(3)` (`Integer`) and four bytes that contain the data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在兩個位元組大於實際儲存變數所需的位元組數目。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least two bytes greater than the actual number of bytes required to store the variable. - 如果寫入的變數是包含字串、 物件`FilePutObject`寫入雙位元組描述元，識別`VarType(8)`的物件，表示的字串，然後再寫入字串資料長度的雙位元組描述元。If the variable being written is an object that contains a string, `FilePutObject` writes a two-byte descriptor identifying the `VarType(8)` of the object, a two-byte descriptor indicating the length of the string, and then writes the string data. 所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`中的參數`FileOpen`函式必須是至少在四個位元組大於字串的實際長度。The record length specified by the `RecordLength` parameter in the `FileOpen` function must be at least four bytes greater than the actual length of the string. 如果您想要將描述項的字串，您應該傳遞`True`至`StringIsFixedLength`參數，而您讀入應該是正確的長度的字串。If you want to put a string without the descriptor, you should pass `True` to the `StringIsFixedLength` parameter, and the string you read into should be the correct length. - 如果寫入的變數陣列，則所指定的記錄長度`RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式必須是大於或等於要寫入的陣列資料和陣列描述元所需的所有位元組的總和。If the variable being written is an array, then the record length specified by the `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function must be greater than or equal to the sum of all the bytes required to write the array data and the array descriptor. 描述元指定陣列大小及每個陣序規範下限的陣序。The descriptor specifies the rank of the array, the size, and the lower bounds for each rank. 其長度等於 2，再加上 8 倍的維度數目: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions)。Its length equals 2 plus 8 times the number of dimensions: (2 + 8 \* NumberOfDimensions). ## 二進位模式Binary Mode 在開啟的檔案`Binary`模式中，所有`Random`套用模式的規則，除了：For files opened in `Binary` mode, all the `Random` mode rules apply, except: - `RecordLength`子句中的`FileOpen`函式沒有任何作用。The `RecordLength` clause in the `FileOpen` function has no effect. `FilePutObject` 將所有的變數，連續地寫入磁碟，也就是沒有記錄之間的填補。`FilePutObject` writes all variables to disk contiguously, that is, without padding between records. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`FilePutObject`函式來將字串寫入檔案。This example uses the `FilePutObject` function to write a string to a file. Public Sub FileWidth (FileNumber As Integer, RecordWidth As Integer)

param.name: RecordWidth
param.span: 0–255 範圍內的數值運算式 (包含頭尾)，表示在開始新行之前，會有多少字元出現在一行上。

span.span: Numeric expression in the range 0–255, inclusive, which indicates how many characters appear on a line before a new line is started.

param.span: 如果 RecordWidth 等於 0，則一行的長度將沒有限制。

span.span: If RecordWidth equals 0, there is no limit to the length of a line.
The default value for RecordWidth is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`FreeFile`提供尚未使用的檔案數字。Use `FreeFile` to supply a file number that is not already being used. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`FreeFile`函式傳回下一個可用的檔案數目。This example uses the `FreeFile` function to return the next available file number. 輸出，在迴圈內，開啟五個檔案和一些範例資料會寫入每一個。Five files are opened for output within the loop, and some sample data is written to each. MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileAttribute GetAttr (string PathName);
.method public static valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileAttribute GetAttr(string PathName) cil managed
Public Function GetAttr (PathName As String) As FileAttribute
public: static Microsoft::VisualBasic::FileAttribute GetAttr(System::String ^ PathName);
static member GetAttr : string -> Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileAttribute

param.name: PathName
param.span: 指定檔案、目錄或資料夾名稱的 運算式。

span.span: expression that specifies a file, directory, or folder name.

param.span: PathName 可包含目錄或資料夾及磁碟機。

span.span: PathName can include the directory or folder, and the drive.

summary.span: 傳回 值，表示檔案、目錄或資料夾的屬性。

span.span: Returns a value that represents the attributes of a file, directory, or folder.

summary.span: 相較於 ， 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

returns.span: 傳回的值是以下列舉值的總和：

span.span: The value returned by is the sum of the following enumeration values:

description.span: 前次備份之後，檔案已經有了變更。

span.span: File has changed since last backup.

para.span: 這些列舉類型 (Enumeration) 是由 Visual Basic 語言所指定。

span.span: These enumerations are specified by the Visual Basic language.

para.span: 您可在程式碼中的任何地方使用這些名稱來取代實際值。

span.span: The names can be used anywhere in your code in place of the actual values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要判斷設定了哪些屬性，請使用`And`運算子來執行所傳回的值的位元比較`GetAttr`函式和您想要個別的檔案屬性的值。To determine which attributes are set, use the `And` operator to perform a bitwise comparison of the value returned by the `GetAttr` function and the value of the individual file attribute you want. 如果結果不是零，該屬性是設定具名的檔案。If the result is not zero, that attribute is set for the named file. 例如，下列的傳回值`And`運算式是零，如果`Archive`未設定屬性：For example, the return value of the following `And` expression is zero if the `Archive` attribute is not set: ```vb Result = GetAttr(FName) And vbArchive ``` 會傳回非零值，如果`Archive`屬性設定。A nonzero value is returned if the `Archive` attribute is set. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`GetAttr`函式來判斷檔案和目錄或資料夾的屬性。This example uses the `GetAttr` function to determine the attributes of a file and directory or folder. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#25)]

使用 Visual Basic 存取檔案

summary.span: 自開啟的循序檔中讀取資料，並將該資料指派至變數。

span.span: Reads data from an open sequential file and assigns the data to variables.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Input (int FileNumber, ref bool Value);
.method public static void Input(int32 FileNumber, bool& Value) cil managed
Public Sub Input (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Boolean)
public: static void Input(int FileNumber, bool % Value);
static member Input : int * -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 當變數所指派的值是讀自於檔案時，這些變數不可以是陣列或物件變數。

span.span: Variable that is assigned the values read from the file—cannot be an array or object variable.

summary.span: 自開啟的循序檔中讀取資料，並將該資料指派至變數。

span.span: Reads data from an open sequential file and assigns the data to variables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Input`函式會提供回溯相容性，而且可能會影響效能。The `Input` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 對於非傳統應用程式，`My.Computer.FileSystem`物件提供更佳的效能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 Visual Basic 存取檔案](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 讀取的資料`Input`通常會先寫入至檔案使用`Write`。Data read with `Input` is usually written to a file by using `Write`. 此函式只適用於在開啟的檔案`Input`或`Binary`模式。Use this function only with files opened in `Input` or `Binary` mode. > [!IMPORTANT] > 從檔案讀取時，請勿根據檔案名稱副檔名的檔案內容的相關決策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of the file based on the file name extension. 例如，名為 Form1.vb 檔案可能不會是 Visual Basic 2005 原始程式檔。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic 2005 source file. 讀取時，標準的字串或數值資料會指派給變數，而不需修改。When read, standard string or numeric data is assigned to variables without modification. 下表將說明如何處理其他輸入的資料。The following table illustrates how other input data is treated. |資料Data|指派給變數的值Value assigned to variable| |-|-| |用來分隔逗號或空白行Delimiting comma or blank line|EmptyEmpty| |#NULL ##NULL#|`DBNull`| |#TRUE # 或 #FALSE ##TRUE# or #FALSE#|`True` 或 `False``True` or `False`| |#`yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss`#|日期和/或運算式所代表的時間The date and/or time represented by the expression| |#ERROR `errornumber`##ERROR `errornumber`#|`errornumber` （變數會是標記為錯誤的物件）`errornumber` (variable is an object tagged as an error)| 如果在輸入資料的項目時，您會到達檔案結尾，停止輸入，而發生錯誤。If you reach the end of the file while you are inputting a data item, the input is stopped and an error occurs. > [!NOTE] > `Input`函式不會進行當地語系化。The `Input` function is not localized. 比方說，在德文版中，如果您輸入 3,14159，它只會傳回 3，因為逗號會被視為變數做為小數點分隔符號而不是。For example, in the German version, if you input 3,14159, it returns only 3, because the comma is treated as a variable separator instead of as a decimal point. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用 從檔案讀取`Input`函式需要`Read`從存取`FileIOPermissionAccess`列舉型別。Reading from a file by using the `Input` function requires `Read` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Input`置於兩個變數，從檔案讀取資料的函式。This example uses the `Input` function to read data from a file into two variables. 這個範例假設`TestFile`是一個檔案，有一些使用寫入的資料行`Write`函式，每一行包含引號，並以逗號分隔，例如數字的字串: ("Hello"，234)。This example assumes that `TestFile` is a file that has some lines of data written to it using the `Write` function, each line containing a string in quotations and a number separated by a comma, for example: ("Hello", 234). [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#35)]

summary.span: 自開啟的循序檔中讀取資料，並將該資料指派至變數。

span.span: Reads data from an open sequential file and assigns the data to variables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Input`函式會提供回溯相容性，而且可能會影響效能。The `Input` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 對於非傳統應用程式，`My.Computer.FileSystem`物件提供更佳的效能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 Visual Basic 存取檔案](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 讀取的資料`Input`通常會先寫入至檔案使用`Write`。Data read with `Input` is usually written to a file by using `Write`. 此函式只適用於在開啟的檔案`Input`或`Binary`模式。Use this function only with files opened in `Input` or `Binary` mode. > [!IMPORTANT] > 從檔案讀取時，請勿根據檔案名稱副檔名的檔案內容的相關決策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of the file based on the file name extension. 例如，名為 Form1.vb 檔案可能不會是 Visual Basic 2005 原始程式檔。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic 2005 source file. 讀取時，標準的字串或數值資料會指派給變數，而不需修改。When read, standard string or numeric data is assigned to variables without modification. 下表將說明如何處理其他輸入的資料。The following table illustrates how other input data is treated. |資料Data|指派給變數的值Value assigned to variable| |-|-| |用來分隔逗號或空白行Delimiting comma or blank line|EmptyEmpty| |#NULL ##NULL#|`DBNull`| |#TRUE # 或 #FALSE ##TRUE# or #FALSE#|`True` 或 `False``True` or `False`| |#`yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss`#|日期和/或運算式所代表的時間The date and/or time represented by the expression| |#ERROR `errornumber`##ERROR `errornumber`#|`errornumber` （變數會是標記為錯誤的物件）`errornumber` (variable is an object tagged as an error)| 如果在輸入資料的項目時，您會到達檔案結尾，停止輸入，而發生錯誤。If you reach the end of the file while you are inputting a data item, the input is stopped and an error occurs. > [!NOTE] > `Input`函式不會進行當地語系化。The `Input` function is not localized. 比方說，在德文版中，如果您輸入 3,14159，它只會傳回 3，因為逗號會被視為變數做為小數點分隔符號而不是。For example, in the German version, if you input 3,14159, it returns only 3, because the comma is treated as a variable separator instead of as a decimal point. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用 從檔案讀取`Input`函式需要`Read`從存取`FileIOPermissionAccess`列舉型別。Reading from a file by using the `Input` function requires `Read` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Input`置於兩個變數，從檔案讀取資料的函式。This example uses the `Input` function to read data from a file into two variables. 這個範例假設`TestFile`是一個檔案，有數行的資料寫入至其中使用`Write`函式，每一行包含引號，並以逗號分隔，例如數字的字串: ("Hello"，234)。This example assumes that `TestFile` is a file that has several lines of data written to it using the `Write` function, each line containing a string in quotations and a number separated by a comma, for example: ("Hello", 234). [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#35)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Input (int FileNumber, ref double Value);
.method public static void Input(int32 FileNumber, float64& Value) cil managed
Public Sub Input (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Double)
public: static void Input(int FileNumber, double % Value);
static member Input : int * -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 當變數所指派的值是讀自於檔案時，這些變數不可以是陣列或物件變數。

span.span: Variable that is assigned the values read from the file—cannot be an array or object variable.

.method public static void Input(int32 FileNumber, object& Value) cil managed
Public Sub Input (FileNumber As Integer, ByRef Value As Object)
public: static void Input(int FileNumber, System::Object ^ % Value);
static member Input : int * -> unit

param.name: Value
param.span: 當變數所指派的值是讀自於檔案時，這些變數不可以是陣列或物件變數。

summary.span: 自開啟的循序檔中讀取資料，並將該資料指派至變數。

span.span: Reads data from an open sequential file and assigns the data to variables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Input`函式會提供回溯相容性，而且可能會影響效能。The `Input` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 對於非傳統應用程式，`My.Computer.FileSystem`物件提供更佳的效能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 Visual Basic 存取檔案](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 讀取的資料`Input`通常會先寫入至檔案使用`Write`。Data read with `Input` is usually written to a file by using `Write`. 此函式只適用於在開啟的檔案`Input`或`Binary`模式。Use this function only with files opened in `Input` or `Binary` mode. > [!IMPORTANT] > 從檔案讀取時，請勿根據檔案名稱副檔名的檔案內容的相關決策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of the file based on the file name extension. 例如，名為 Form1.vb 檔案可能不會是 Visual Basic 2005 原始程式檔。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic 2005 source file. 讀取時，標準的字串或數值資料會指派給變數，而不需修改。When read, standard string or numeric data is assigned to variables without modification. 下表將說明如何處理其他輸入的資料。The following table illustrates how other input data is treated. |資料Data|指派給變數的值Value assigned to variable| |-|-| |用來分隔逗號或空白行Delimiting comma or blank line|EmptyEmpty| |#NULL ##NULL#|`DBNull`| |#TRUE # 或 #FALSE ##TRUE# or #FALSE#|`True` 或 `False``True` or `False`| |#`yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss`#|日期和/或運算式所代表的時間The date and/or time represented by the expression| |#ERROR `errornumber`##ERROR `errornumber`#|`errornumber` （變數會是標記為錯誤的物件）`errornumber` (variable is an object tagged as an error)| 如果在輸入資料的項目時，您會到達檔案結尾，停止輸入，而發生錯誤。If you reach the end of the file while you are inputting a data item, the input is stopped and an error occurs. > [!NOTE] > `Input`函式不會進行當地語系化。The `Input` function is not localized. 比方說，在德文版中，如果您輸入 3,14159，它只會傳回 3，因為逗號會被視為變數做為小數點分隔符號而不是。For example, in the German version, if you input 3,14159, it returns only 3, because the comma is treated as a variable separator instead of as a decimal point. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用 從檔案讀取`Input`函式需要`Read`從存取`FileIOPermissionAccess`列舉型別。Reading from a file by using the `Input` function requires `Read` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Input`置於兩個變數，從檔案讀取資料的函式。This example uses the `Input` function to read data from a file into two variables. 這個範例假設`TestFile`是一個檔案，有數行的資料寫入至其中使用`Write`函式，每一行包含引號，並以逗號分隔，例如數字的字串: ("Hello"，234)。This example assumes that `TestFile` is a file that has several lines of data written to it using the `Write` function, each line containing a string in quotations and a number separated by a comma, for example: ("Hello", 234). [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#35)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static string InputString (int FileNumber, int CharCount);
.method public static string InputString(int32 FileNumber, int32 CharCount) cil managed
Public Function InputString (FileNumber As Integer, CharCount As Integer) As String
public: static System::String ^ InputString(int FileNumber, int CharCount);
static member InputString : int * int -> string

param.name: CharCount
param.span: 任何有效的數值運算式，指定要讀取的字元數。

span.span: Any valid numeric expression specifying the number of characters to read.

summary.span: 傳回 值，其中包含於 或 模式下開啟之檔案中的字元。

span.span: Returns value that contains characters from a file opened in or mode.

summary.span: 相較於 ， 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

returns.span: 傳回 值，其中包含於 或 模式下開啟之檔案中的字元。

span.span: Returns value that contains characters from a file opened in or mode.

returns.span: 相較於 ， 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `InputString`函式會提供回溯相容性，而且可能會影響效能。The `InputString` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 對於非傳統應用程式，`My.Computer.FileSystem`物件提供更佳的效能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 Visual Basic 存取檔案](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 讀取的資料`InputString`函式通常利用寫入至檔案`Print`或`FilePut`。Data read with the `InputString` function is usually written to a file by using `Print` or `FilePut`. 此函式只適用於在開啟的檔案`Input`或`Binary`模式。Use this function only with files opened in `Input` or `Binary` mode. 不同於`Input`函式，`InputString`函式會傳回讀取的字元。Unlike the `Input` function, the `InputString` function returns all the characters it reads. 這包括逗號、 換行字元、 換行、 引號和前置空格。This includes commas, carriage returns, line feeds, quotation marks, and leading spaces. 使用開啟的檔案`Binary`存取，嘗試讀取檔案，使用`InputString`運作直到`EOF`傳回`True`會產生錯誤。With files opened for `Binary` access, an attempt to read through the file by using the `InputString` function until `EOF` returns `True` generates an error. 使用`LOF`並`Loc`函數，而`EOF`藉由讀取二進位檔案時`InputString`，或使用`FileGet`當您使用`EOF`函式。Use the `LOF` and `Loc` functions instead of `EOF` when you read binary files by using `InputString`, or use `FileGet` when you use the `EOF` function. > [!NOTE] > 從檔案讀取時，請勿依據副檔名的檔案內容的相關安全性決策。When reading from files, do not make security decisions about the contents of the file based on the file name extension. 例如，名為 Form1.vb 檔案可能不是 Visual Basic 來源檔案。For example, a file named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`InputString`函式來從檔案一次讀取一個字元，並列印它`Output`視窗。This example uses the `InputString` function to read one character at a time from a file and print it to the `Output` window. 這個範例假設`MyFile`是具有數行的範例資料的文字檔。This example assumes that `MyFile` is a text file that has several lines of sample data. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#33)]

param.name: PathName
param.span: 運算式，指定要刪除的一個或多個檔案的名稱。

span.span: expression that specifies one or more file names to be deleted.

param.span: PathName 可包含目錄或資料夾及磁碟機。

span.span: PathName can include the directory or folder, and the drive.

summary.span: 從磁碟中刪除檔案。
相較於 ， 功能可提升檔案 I/O 作業的產能和效能。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than .

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Kill` 支援使用多個字元 (`*`) 和單一字元 (`?`) 萬用字元來指定多個檔案。`Kill` supports the use of multiple-character (`*`) and single-character (`?`) wildcards to specify multiple files. **安全性注意事項**才能執行，請`Kill`函式需要`Read`並`PathDiscovery`加上旗標的要授與執行的程式碼。**Security Note** In order to execute, the `Kill` function requires `Read` and `PathDiscovery` flags of to be granted to the executing code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [程式碼存取權限](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)For more information, see [Code Access Permissions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675) ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Kill`函式來從磁碟中刪除檔案。This example uses the `Kill` function to delete a file from a disk. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#60](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#60)]

summary.span: 從開啟的循序檔案中讀取單一行，並將它指派給 變數。

span.span: Reads a single line from an open sequential file and assigns it to a variable.

returns.span: 從開啟的循序檔案中讀取單一行，並將它指派給 變數。

span.span: Reads a single line from an open sequential file and assigns it to a variable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `LineInput`函式會提供回溯相容性，而且可能會影響效能。The `LineInput` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 對於非傳統應用程式，`My.Computer.FileSystem`物件提供更佳的效能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 Visual Basic 存取檔案](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 讀取的資料`LineInput`通常會先寫入至檔案使用`Print`。Data read with `LineInput` is usually written to a file by using `Print`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 從檔案讀取時，請勿根據檔案名稱副檔名的檔案內容的相關決策。When reading from files, do not make decisions about the contents of a file based on the file name extension. 例如，名為 Form1.vb 檔案可能不會是 Visual Basic 來源檔案。For example, a file that is named Form1.vb may not be a Visual Basic source file. `LineInput`函式會從檔案的一個字元讀取一次直到遇到歸位字元 (`Chr(13)`) 或歸位字元/換 (`Chr(13) + Chr(10)`) 順序。The `LineInput` function reads from a file one character at a time until it encounters a carriage return (`Chr(13)`) or carriage return/line feed (`Chr(13) + Chr(10)`) sequence. 歸位字元 return/line 摘要的序列會略過而不是附加的字元字串。Carriage return/line feed sequences are skipped instead of appended to the character string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用 從檔案讀取`LineInput`函式需要`Read`從存取列舉型別。Reading from a file by using the `LineInput` function requires `Read` access from the enumeration. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`LineInput`從循序檔案讀取一行，並將它指派給變數的函式。This example uses the `LineInput` function to read a line from a sequential file and assign it to a variable. 這個範例假設`TestFile`是具有數行的範例資料的文字檔。This example assumes that `TestFile` is a text file that has several lines of sample data. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#19)]

span.span: Returns a value that specifies the current read/write position in an open file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Loc`為以零為起始的函式，使用它來擷取檔案中的第一個位元組，則會傳回 0。The `Loc` function is zero-based; using it to retrieve the first byte in a file will return 0. `Loc`函式會提供回溯相容性，而且可能會影響效能。The `Loc` function is provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 對於非傳統應用程式，`My.Computer.FileSystem`物件提供更佳的效能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 Visual Basic 存取檔案](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 以下說明每個檔案存取模式的傳回值：The following describes the return value for each file access mode: |模式Mode|傳回值Return value| |-|-| |`Random`|讀取或寫入檔案的最後一個記錄的數目。Number of the last record read from or written to the file.| |`Sequential`|除以 128 檔案中的目前位元組位置。Current byte position in the file divided by 128. 不過，資訊會由`Loc`的循序檔案不會使用或所需。However, information returned by `Loc` for sequential files is neither used nor required.| |`Binary`|讀取或寫入的最後一個位元組的位置。Position of the last byte read or written.| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Loc`函式來傳回目前的讀取/寫入位置，在開啟的檔案。This example uses the `Loc` function to return the current read/write position in an open file. 這個範例假設`MyFile`是具有數行的範例資料的文字檔。This example assumes that `MyFile` is a text file that has several lines of sample data. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#17)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Lock`和`Unlock`函式適用於環境中，數個程序可能需要存取相同的檔案。The `Lock` and `Unlock` functions are used in environments where several processes might need access to the same file. `Lock` 和`Unlock`函式一律會在配對。`Lock` and `Unlock` functions are always used in pairs. 引數`Lock`和`Unlock`必須相同。The arguments to `Lock` and `Unlock` must be identical. 如果`Record`，或`FromRecord`和`ToRecord`都未提供，鎖定將會針對整個檔案。If `Record`, or `FromRecord` and `ToRecord` are not supplied, the lock will be for the whole file. 如果`Record`單獨指定單一資料錄將會鎖定/解除鎖定。If `Record` alone is specified the single record will be locked/unlocked. 如果已為循序的輸入或輸出中，開啟檔案`Lock`並`Unlock`影響整個檔案，而不論所指定的範圍`FromRecord`和`ToRecord`。If the file has been opened for sequential input or output, `Lock` and `Unlock` affect the whole file, regardless of the range specified by `FromRecord` and`ToRecord`. ## Examples 此範例說明如何使用`Lock`和`Unlock`函式。This example illustrates the use of the `Lock` and `Unlock` functions. 這個範例假設`People.txt`是包含的結構記錄檔`Person`。This example assumes that `People.txt` is a file that contains records of the structure `Person`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#13)]

span.span: Writes display-formatted data to a sequential file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Print`和`PrintLine`函式針對回溯相容性提供，而且可能會影響效能。The `Print` and `PrintLine` functions are provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 對於非傳統應用程式，`My.Computer.FileSystem`物件提供更佳的效能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 Visual Basic 存取檔案](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). `Print` 不包含換行字元結尾的行不過，`PrintLine`包含換行字元。`Print` does not include a line feed at the end of a line; however, `PrintLine` does include a line feed. 資料寫入`Print`通常從檔案讀取利用`LineInput`或`Input`。Data written with `Print` is usually read from a file by using `LineInput` or `Input`. 如果您省略`Output`for `PrintLine`，列印一行空白行檔案; 如`Print`，沒有輸出。If you omit `Output` for `PrintLine`, a blank line is printed to the file; for `Print`, nothing is output. 多個以逗號分隔的運算式將會對齊索引標籤的界限，但混用逗號和`TAB`可能會導致不一致的結果。Multiple expressions separated with a comma will be aligned on tab boundaries, but mixing commas and `TAB` may cause inconsistent results. 針對`Boolean`資料，可以是`True`或`False`列印。For `Boolean` data, either `True` or `False` is printed. `True`和`False`關鍵字不會轉譯，不論地區設定為何。The `True` and `False` keywords are not translated, regardless of the locale. 日期資料寫入檔案中，使用您的系統可辨識的標準的簡短日期格式。Date data is written to the file by using the standard short date format recognized by your system. 當日期或時間的元件遺失或為零時，只提供部分寫入至檔案。When either the date or the time component is missing or zero, only the part provided is written to the file. 如果，則不寫入至檔案`Output`是空的資料。Nothing is written to the file if `Output` data is empty. 不過，如果`Output`清單中的資料`DBNull`，`Null`寫入檔案。However, if `Output` list data is `DBNull`, `Null` is written to the file. 針對`Error`資料，輸出會顯示為`Error errorcode`。For `Error` data, the output appears as `Error errorcode`. `Error`不論地區設定不會轉譯關鍵字。The `Error` keyword is not translated regardless of the locale. 寫入檔案中使用的所有資料`Print`是國際感知; 也就是資料已正確地格式化使用適當的小數分隔符號。All data written to the file by using `Print` is internationally aware; that is, the data is correctly formatted using the appropriate decimal separator. 如果使用者想要輸出多個地區設定中，供資料`Write`應該使用。If the user wishes to output data for use by multiple locales, `Write` should be used. 寫入檔案，使用`Print`或是`PrintLine`函式需要`Write`從存取`FileIOPermissionAccess`列舉型別。Writing to a file by using the `Print` or `PrintLine` functions requires `Write` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Print`和`PrintLine`函式，將資料寫入檔案。This example uses the `Print` and `PrintLine` functions to write data to a file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#53](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#53)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Print`和`PrintLine`函式針對回溯相容性提供，而且可能會影響效能。The `Print` and `PrintLine` functions are provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 對於非傳統應用程式，`My.Computer.FileSystem`物件提供更佳的效能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 Visual Basic 存取檔案](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). `Print` 不包含換行字元結尾的行不過，`PrintLine`包含換行字元。`Print` does not include a line feed at the end of a line; however,`PrintLine` does include a line feed. 資料寫入`Print`通常從檔案讀取利用`LineInput`或`Input`。Data written with `Print` is usually read from a file by using `LineInput` or `Input`. 如果您省略`Output`for `PrintLine`，列印一行空白行檔案; 如`Print`，沒有輸出。If you omit `Output` for `PrintLine`, a blank line is printed to the file; for `Print`, nothing is output. 多個以逗號分隔的運算式將會對齊索引標籤的界限，但混用逗號和`TAB`可能會導致不一致的結果。Multiple expressions separated with a comma will be aligned on tab boundaries, but mixing commas and `TAB` may cause inconsistent results. 針對`Boolean`資料，可以是`True`或`False`列印。For `Boolean` data, either `True` or `False` is printed. `True`和`False`關鍵字不會轉譯，不論地區設定為何。The `True` and `False` keywords are not translated, regardless of the locale. 日期資料寫入檔案中，使用系統可辨識的標準的簡短日期格式。Date data is written to the file by using the standard short date format recognized by the system. 當日期或時間的元件遺失或為零時，只提供部分寫入至檔案。When either the date or the time component is missing or zero, only the part provided is written to the file. 如果，則不寫入至檔案`Output`是空的資料。Nothing is written to the file if `Output` data is empty. 不過，如果`Output`清單中的資料`DBNull`，`Null`寫入檔案。However, if `Output` list data is `DBNull`, `Null` is written to the file. 針對`Error`資料，輸出會顯示為`Error errorcode`。For `Error` data, the output appears as `Error errorcode`. `Error`不論地區設定不會轉譯關鍵字。The `Error` keyword is not translated regardless of the locale. 寫入檔案中使用的所有資料`Print`是國際感知; 也就是資料已正確地格式化使用適當的小數分隔符號。All data written to the file by using `Print` is internationally aware; that is, the data is correctly formatted using the appropriate decimal separator. 如果使用者想要輸出多個地區設定中，供資料`Write`應該使用。If the user wishes to output data for use by multiple locales, `Write` should be used. 寫入檔案，使用`Print`或是`PrintLine`函式需要`Write`從存取`FileIOPermissionAccess`列舉型別。Writing to a file by using the `Print` or `PrintLine` functions requires `Write` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Print`和`PrintLine`函式，將資料寫入檔案。This example uses the `Print` and `PrintLine` functions to write data to a file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#53](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#53)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Rename`函式重新命名檔案，並將它移到另一個目錄，如有必要。The`Rename` function renames a file and moves it to a different directory, if it is required. `Rename`函式可以將檔案移到磁碟機，但它只能重新命名現有的目錄時兩者`NewPath`和`OldPath`都位於相同的磁碟機。The `Rename` function can move a file across drives, but it can only rename an existing directory when both `NewPath` and `OldPath` are located on the same drive. `Rename` 無法建立新的檔案或目錄。`Rename` cannot create a new file or directory. 使用`Rename`函式開啟的檔案會產生錯誤。Using the `Rename` function on an open file produces an error. 您必須先關閉開啟的檔案，才能重新命名。You must close an open file before renaming it. `Rename` 引數不能包含多個字元 （\*） 和單一字元 （？） 的萬用字元。`Rename` arguments cannot include multiple-character (\*) and single-character (?) wildcards. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當使用`Rename`將來自未受保護位置的檔案複製到受保護的位置中，該檔案會保留的限制較少的權限。When using `Rename` to copy a file from an unprotected location to a protected location, the file retains the less restricted rights. 請檢查以確定未造成可能的安全性風險。Check to make sure that you are not introducing a possible security risk. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Rename`函式來重新命名檔案。This example uses the `Rename` function to rename a file. 基於此範例的詳細資訊，請假設已指定的目錄已經存在。For purposes of this example, assume that the directories that are specified already exist. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#30)]

exception.span: 無法重新命名為不同的裝置。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Reset`函式會關閉開啟的所有作用中檔案`FileOpen`函式，並具有相同的功能`FileClose()`不含任何參數。The `Reset` function closes all active files opened by the `FileOpen` function and has the same function as `FileClose()` without any parameters. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Reset`函式來關閉所有開啟的檔案並寫入磁碟中的所有檔案緩衝區的內容。This example uses the `Reset` function to close all open files and write the contents of all file buffers to disk. 請注意，使用`Object`變數`FileNumber`做為字串和數字。Note the use of the `Object` variable `FileNumber` as both a string and a number. returns.span: 傳回指定使用 函式開啟的檔案中目前讀取/寫入位置的 ，或設定使用 函式開啟的檔案中下一個讀取/寫入作業的位置。

span.span: Returns a specifying the current read/write position in a file opened by using the function, or sets the position for the next read/write operation in a file opened by using the function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Seek` 傳回介於 1 到 2,147,483,647 之間的值 (相當於 2 ^31-1) 之間，內含。`Seek` returns a value between 1 and 2,147,483,647 (equivalent to 2^31 – 1), inclusive. 以下說明每個檔案存取模式的傳回值：The following describes the return values for each file access mode: |模式Mode|傳回值Return Value| |-|-| |`Random`|下一個記錄讀取或寫入的數目Number of the next record read or written| |`Binary`, `Input`, `Output`, `Append``Binary`, `Input`, `Output`, `Append`|下一項作業就會發生的位元組位置。Byte position at which the next operation occurs. 在檔案中的第一個位元組位於位置 1，第二個位元組是在位置 2，以此類推。The first byte in a file is at position 1, the second byte is at position 2, and so on.| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Seek`函數來傳回目前的檔案位置。This example uses the `Seek` function to return the current file position. 此範例假設`TestFile`是包含的結構記錄檔`Record`。The example assumes `TestFile` is a file that contains records of the structure `Record`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#47](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#47)] 在開啟的檔案`Random`模式中，`Seek`傳回下一筆記錄的數目。For files opened in `Random` mode, `Seek` returns the number of next record. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#48)] 以外的其他模式中開啟之檔案`Random`模式中，`Seek`傳回下一項作業就會發生的位元組位置。For files opened in modes other than `Random` mode, `Seek` returns the byte position at which the next operation occurs. 假設`TestFile`是包含幾行文字的檔案。Assume `TestFile` is a file that contains several lines of text. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#49](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#49)] 這個範例會使用`Seek`函式，以將位置設定下一個要讀取或寫入檔案。This example uses the `Seek` function to set the position for the next read or write in a file. 以外的其他模式中開啟之檔案`Random`模式中，`Seek`設定下一個作業就會發生的位元組位置。For files opened in modes other than `Random` mode, `Seek` sets the byte position at which the next operation occurs. 假設`TestFile`是包含幾行文字的檔案。Assume `TestFile` is a file that contains several lines of text. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#52](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#52)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您嘗試設定已開啟之檔案的屬性，就會發生執行階段錯誤。A run-time error occurs if you try to set the attributes of an open file. `Attributes`引數的列舉值如下所示：The `Attributes` argument enumeration values are as follows: |值Value|常數Constant|描述Description| |-|-|-| |`Normal`|`vbNormal`|標準模式 （預設值）。Normal (default).| |`ReadOnly`|`vbReadOnly`|唯讀。Read-only.| |`Hidden`|`vbHidden`|隱藏。Hidden.| |`System`|`vbSystem`|系統檔案。System file.| |`Volume`|`vbVolume`|磁碟區標籤Volume label| |`Directory`|`vbDirectory`|目錄或資料夾。Directory or folder.| |`Archive`|`vbArchive`|前次備份之後，檔案已經有了變更。File has changed since last backup.| |`Alias`|`vbAlias`|檔案有不同的名稱。File has a different name.| > [!NOTE] > 這些列舉類型 (Enumeration) 是由 Visual Basic 語言所指定。These enumerations are specified by the Visual Basic language. 名稱可在您的程式碼，而不是實際的值中的任何地方使用。The names can be used anywhere in your code instead of the actual values. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`SetAttr`函式來設定檔案的屬性。This example uses the `SetAttr` function to set attributes for a file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#14)]

span.span: Used with the or function to position output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`Count`少於輸出行寬度下, 一個列印位置立即遵循的列印的空格數目。If `Count` is less than the output line width, the next print position immediately follows the number of spaces printed. 如果`Count`大於輸出行寬度，`SPC`計算中使用的公式的下一步 列印位置：If`Count` is greater than the output line width, `SPC` calculates the next print position using the formula: `currentprintposition`(+(`Count``Mod``width`))`currentprintposition`(+(`Count``Mod``width`)) 比方說，如果目前的列印位置為 24，輸出行寬度是 80，且您指定`SPC(90)`下, 一個列印時會啟動位置為 34 （目前的列印位置 + 90/80 的餘數）。For example, if the current print position is 24, the output line width is 80, and you specify `SPC(90)`, the next print will start at position 34 (current print position + the remainder of 90/80). 如果目前的列印位置與輸出行寬度之間的差異是小於`Count`(或`Count` `Mod` *寬度*)，則`SPC`函式就會跳到下一行的開頭，並產生空間等於`Count`– (*寬度*– *currentprintposition*)。If the difference between the current print position and the output line width is less than `Count` (or `Count` `Mod` *width*), the `SPC` function skips to the start of the next line and generates spaces equal to `Count` – (*width* – *currentprintposition*). > [!NOTE] > 請確定您的表格式資料行的寬度不足以容納寬字母。Make sure your tabular columns are wide enough to allow for wide letters. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`SPC`函式用於定位輸出檔案中，然後在**輸出**視窗。This example uses the `SPC` function to position output in a file and in the **Output** window. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#16)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前的行上目前的列印位置大於`Column`，`TAB`就會跳到資料行值等於`Column`在下一步 的輸出行。If the current print position on the current line is larger than `Column`, `TAB` skips to the column value equal to `Column` on the next output line. 如果`Column`小於 1，`TAB`的列印位置移至 資料行 1。If `Column` is less than 1, `TAB` moves the print position to column 1. 如果`Column`大於輸出行寬度，`TAB`計算中使用的公式的下一步 列印位置：If `Column` is larger than the output line width, `TAB` calculates the next print position using the formula: 資料行的 Mod 寬度Column Mod width 例如，如果*寬度*是 80，且您指定`TAB(90)`下, 一個列印會開始於行 10 （90/80 的餘數）。For example, if *width* is 80 and you specify `TAB(90)`, the next print will start at column 10 (the remainder of 90/80). 如果`Column`小於目前的列印位置，在下一行中的導出的列印位置在列印開始。If `Column` is less than the current print position, printing starts on the next line at the calculated print position. 如果導出的列印位置大於目前的列印位置，列印會在計算列印位置位於同一行上。If the calculated print position is larger than the current print position, printing starts at the calculated print position on the same line. 在輸出行上最左邊的列印位置一律為 1。The leftmost print position on an output line is always 1. 當您使用`Print`或是`PrintLine`函數來列印至檔案，最右邊的列印位置是輸出檔，您可以使用設定的目前寬度`FileWidth`函式。When you use the `Print` or `PrintLine` functions to print to files, the rightmost print position is the current width of the output file, which you can set using the `FileWidth` function. `TAB`函式也會搭配`WriteLine`函式。The `TAB` function can also be used with the `WriteLine` function. 它不能搭配或。It cannot be used with or . > [!NOTE] > 請確定您的表格式資料行的寬度不足以包含廣泛的字母。Make sure your tabular columns are wide enough to contain wide letters. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`TAB`函式用於定位輸出檔案中，然後在**輸出**視窗。This example uses the `TAB` function to position output in a file and in the **Output** window. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#37](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#37)]

summary.span: 控制項由其他處理序存取以 函式開啟的整個或部分檔案。

span.span: The feature gives you better productivity and performance in file I/O operations than and .

summary.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Lock`和`Unlock`函式適用於環境中，數個程序可能需要存取相同的檔案。The `Lock` and `Unlock` functions are used in environments where several processes might need access to the same file. `Lock` 和`Unlock`函式一律會在配對。`Lock` and `Unlock` functions are always used in pairs. 引數`Lock`和`Unlock`必須相同。The arguments to `Lock` and `Unlock` must be identical. 如果`Record`，或`FromRecord`和`ToRecord`都未提供，鎖定將會針對整個檔案。If `Record`, or `FromRecord` and `ToRecord` are not supplied, the lock will be for the whole file. 如果`Record`單獨指定單一資料錄將會鎖定/解除鎖定。If `Record` alone is specified the single record will be locked/unlocked. 如果已為循序的輸入或輸出中，開啟檔案`Lock`並`Unlock`影響整個檔案，而不論所指定的範圍`FromRecord`和`ToRecord`。If the file has been opened for sequential input or output, `Lock` and `Unlock` affect the whole file, regardless of the range specified by `FromRecord` and`ToRecord`. ## Examples 此範例說明如何使用`Lock`和`Unlock`函式。This example illustrates the use of the `Lock` and `Unlock` functions. 這個範例假設`People.txt`是包含的結構記錄檔`Person`。This example assumes that `People.txt` is a file that contains records of the structure `Person`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#13)]

span.span: Data written with is usually read from a file by using .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Write`和`WriteLine`函式針對回溯相容性提供，而且可能會影響效能。The `Write` and `WriteLine` functions are provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 對於非傳統應用程式，`My.Computer.FileSystem`物件提供更佳的效能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 Visual Basic 存取檔案](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 如果您省略`Output`，空白的線條會列印到檔案。If you omit `Output`, a blank line is printed to the file. 可以以逗號分隔的多個運算式。Multiple expressions can be separated with a comma. 不同於`Print`函式，`Write`函式會插入項目和字串的引號之間插入逗號會寫入至檔案。Unlike the `Print` function, the `Write` function inserts commas between items and quotation marks around strings as they are written to the file. 您沒有在清單中放置明確的分隔符號。You do not have to put explicit delimiters in the list. 當`Write`用來將資料寫入至檔案，只是數字`Boolean`，日期、 null、 和`Error`支援的資料格式。When `Write` is used to write data to a file, only numeric, `Boolean`, date, null, and `Error` data formats are supported. 因此資料一律可以讀取並正確地解譯使用遵循下列通用假設`Input`，而不論地區設定：The following universal assumptions are followed so the data can always be read and correctly interpreted using `Input`, regardless of locale: - 寫入的數值資料使用句點作為小數分隔符號。Numeric data is always written using the period as the decimal separator. - 針對`Boolean`資料，可以是`#TRUE#`或`#FALSE#`列印。For `Boolean` data, either `#TRUE#` or `#FALSE#` is printed. `True`和`False`關鍵字不會轉譯，不論地區設定為何。The `True` and `False` keywords are not translated, regardless of locale. - 日期資料會寫入至使用通用的日期格式的檔案。Date data is written to the file using the universal date format. 當日期或時間的元件遺失或為零時，只提供部分寫入至檔案。When either the date or the time component is missing or zero, only the part provided is written to the file. - 如果，則不寫入至檔案`Output`是空的資料。Nothing is written to the file if `Output` data is empty. 不過，對於 null 資料，`#NULL#`寫入。However, for null data, `#NULL#` is written. - 針對`Error`資料，輸出會顯示為`#ERROR errorcode#`。For `Error` data, the output appears as `#ERROR errorcode#`. `Error`關鍵字不會轉譯，不論地區設定為何。The `Error` keyword is not translated, regardless of locale. `WriteLine` 插入新行字元 (也就是歸位字元/換，或是`Chr(13) + Chr(10)`)，撰寫最後一個字元之後`Output`檔案。`WriteLine` inserts a newline character (that is, a carriage return/line feed, or `Chr(13) + Chr(10)`), after it has written the final character in `Output` to the file. 您也可以使用雙引號括住，在字串中內嵌引號或""。You can embed quotation marks in a string by using double quotation marks, or "". 例如，套用至物件的For example, [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#63](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#63)] 傳回字串，其值為`Double quotation marks aren't "difficult" to handle`。returns a string with the value of `Double quotation marks aren't "difficult" to handle`. 寫入檔案，使用`Write`或是`WriteLine`函式需要`Append`從存取`FileIOPermissionAccess`列舉型別。Writing to a file by using the `Write` or `WriteLine` functions requires `Append` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Write`函式，將原始資料寫入循序檔。This example uses the `Write` function to write raw data to a sequential file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#64](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#64)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Write`和`WriteLine`函式針對回溯相容性提供，而且可能會影響效能。The `Write` and `WriteLine` functions are provided for backward compatibility and may affect performance. 對於非傳統應用程式，`My.Computer.FileSystem`物件提供更佳的效能。For non-legacy applications, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides better performance. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用 Visual Basic 存取檔案](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md)。For more information, see [File Access with Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/file-access.md). 如果您省略`Output`，空白的線條會列印到檔案。If you omit `Output`, a blank line is printed to the file. 可以以逗號分隔的多個運算式。Multiple expressions can be separated with a comma. 不同於`Print`函式，`Write`函式會插入項目和字串的引號之間插入逗號會寫入至檔案。Unlike the `Print` function, the `Write` function inserts commas between items and quotation marks around strings as they are written to the file. 您沒有在清單中放置明確的分隔符號。You do not have to put explicit delimiters in the list. 當`Write`用來將資料寫入至檔案，只是數字`Boolean`，日期、 null、 和`Error`支援的資料格式。When `Write` is used to write data to a file, only numeric, `Boolean`, date, null, and `Error` data formats are supported. 因此資料一律可以讀取並正確地解譯使用遵循下列通用假設`Input`，而不論地區設定：The following universal assumptions are followed so the data can always be read and correctly interpreted using `Input`, regardless of locale: - 寫入的數值資料使用句點作為小數分隔符號。Numeric data is always written using the period as the decimal separator. - 針對`Boolean`資料，可以是`#TRUE#`或`#FALSE#`列印。For `Boolean` data, either `#TRUE#` or `#FALSE#` is printed. `True`和`False`關鍵字不會轉譯，不論地區設定為何。The `True` and `False` keywords are not translated, regardless of locale. - 日期資料會寫入至使用通用的日期格式的檔案。Date data is written to the file using the universal date format. 當日期或時間的元件遺失或為零時，只提供部分寫入至檔案。When either the date or the time component is missing or zero, only the part provided is written to the file. - 如果，則不寫入至檔案`Output`是空的資料。Nothing is written to the file if `Output` data is empty. 不過，對於 null 資料，`#NULL#`寫入。However, for null data, `#NULL#` is written. - 針對`Error`資料，輸出會顯示為`#ERROR errorcode#`。For `Error` data, the output appears as `#ERROR errorcode#`. `Error`關鍵字不會轉譯，不論地區設定為何。The `Error` keyword is not translated, regardless of locale. `WriteLine` 插入新行字元 (也就是歸位字元/換，或是`Chr(13) + Chr(10)`)，撰寫最後一個字元之後`Output`檔案。`WriteLine` inserts a newline character (that is, a carriage return/line feed, or `Chr(13) + Chr(10)`), after it has written the final character in `Output` to the file. 您也可以使用雙引號括住，在字串中內嵌引號或""。You can embed quotation marks in a string by using double quotation marks, or "". 例如，套用至物件的For example, [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#63](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#63)] 傳回字串，其值為`Double quotation marks aren't "difficult" to handle`。returns a string with the value of `Double quotation marks aren't "difficult" to handle`. 寫入檔案，使用`Write`或是`WriteLine`函式需要`Append`從存取`FileIOPermissionAccess`列舉型別。Writing to a file by using the `Write` or `WriteLine` functions requires `Append` access from the `FileIOPermissionAccess` enumeration. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 這個範例會使用`Write`函式，將原始資料寫入循序檔。This example uses the `Write` function to write raw data to a sequential file. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#64](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#64)]
